CHAPTER.VERS: Topain Moses sam a, kikhopna buk panin amah hopihin hih bangin ci hi:Topa

“Israel mite tungah gen inla, amaute tungah hih bangin ci in: Note khatpeuh inTopa’tungah biakna na paipih uh ciangin, ganhing tawh na biakna pen bawnghon panin hitaleh tuuhon panin hitaleh na paipih ding uh hi.Topa’
“Ama biakna pen bawnghon panin meihal biakna ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo a pa khat pia dinga,Topa’mai-ah a kisan theih nadingin kikhopna bukkongah pia ding hi.Topa’
Amah in meihal biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga dinga, ama adingin kilemna bawl nadingin kisang ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah inTopa’mai-ah a bawngtal go ding hi. Aaron’ suan siampite in a si hong paipihin, kikhopna buk kong-a biakna tau kimkotah a si theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna ganhing a vun hawkin semnen dinga,
Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau tungah mei koihin, mei tungah a ngeina bangin sing koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in a sanente, a lutang le a thaute, biakna tau tunga om mei tunga sing tungah a ngeina bangin koih dinga,
ahih hangin a sungkuate le a khete tui tawh sil ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in mei tawh kihal biakna,Topaadingin a gim namtui, meihal biakna-in biakna tau tungah a vekpi-in hal ding hi.Topa
“Meihal biak nadingin ama letsong pen tuu hitaleh keel hitaleh a hon lak panin ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo a pa khat pia ding hi.
Amah inTopa’mai biakna tau tung leilu lampangah go dinga, Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in semnen dinga, biakna tau tunga om mei tunga sing tungah a ngeina bangin siampipa in a lutang le a thau tawh koih khawm dinga,

ahih hangin a sungkuate le a khete amah in tui tawh sil ding hi. Siampipa in a vekpi-in pia-in, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Tua penTopaadingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakpiakna ahi hi.Topa
“Topa’tungah ama biakna pen vasa tawh meihal biakna ahihleh, amah in vakhu tawh ahi zongin, kawl vakhuno tawh ahi zongin, a biakna hong paipih ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin siampipa in biakna tau-ah paipihin a lu heektat dinga, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Biakna tau pangah a si taak khiasak ding hi.
Amah in a tangkhai le a multe bot khia-in, vut koihna, biakna tau pang nisuahna lamah lawn khia ding hi.

Amah in a khate-in balkek dinga, ahih hangin baltat lo ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in mei tunga om sing tung, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Tua penTopaadingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakna ahi hi.Topa
“Mi khatpeuh inTopa’tungah an tawh biakna hong paipih leh, ama biakpiakna pen annel hi ding hi. Amah in tua annel tungah sathau sungin, paknamtui koihin,Topa’

tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite kiangah paipih ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in annel khutdim le sathau, a paknamtui khempeuh tawh la dinga, siampipa in hih penTopaadingin a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna, phawkna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.Topa
An tawh biakna a val teng pen Aaron le a tapate ading hi ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh biakna sung panin a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’
“Nangmah in biak nadingin meibung sunga ki-em an tawh biakna na paipih ciangin, silngo sawh loh, sathau tawh a kizut mohpheng hi ding hi.
“Na biakna pen beelpei daii tunga ki-em an tawh biakna ahihleh, sathau tawh a kibawl annel hi ding hi.
Balnenin a tungah sathau na sung ding hi. Tua pen an tawh biakna ahi hi.
“Na biakna pen sikbeel daii sunga kihuan an tawh biakna ahihleh, sathau tawh a kibawl annel hi ding hi.
Nangmah in hih nate tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna,Topa’kiangah na paipih dinga, siampipa kiangah a kipaipih ciangin amah in biakna tau-ah paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in an tawh biakna panin a phawkna biakna teng la-in,Topa’tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.Topa’
An tawh biakna a val teng pen Aaron le a tapate ading hi ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh biakna sung panin a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’
“Topa’tungah na paipih an tawh biakna pen silngo tawh kibawl lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh silngo hitaleh khuaizu hitaleh khat peuhpeuhTopa’tungah meihal biakna-in na hal kei ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Anpal tawh biakna ahihlehTopa’kiangah na paipih thei ding hi. Ahih hangin a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah kipia lo ding hi.Topa’
An tawh na biaknate khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi. An tawh na biakna-ah na Pasian tawh na thuciamna ci sawh loin na om kei dinga, na biakna khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi.
“Anpal tawhTopa’tungah biakna na piak leh, anpal tawh na biak nadingin a vui thak panin kila-in a kigawivui, mei-ah a kihangkeu na pia ding hi.Topa’
Nang in a tungah sathau sungin, paknamtui na buak ding hi. Tua pen an tawh biakna ahi hi.
Siampipa in phawk nadingin a kigawivui an pawlkhat, a sathau le a paknamtui khempeuh hal ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah meihal biakna ahi hi.Topa’
“Mi khat’ biakna pen thunuama biakna ahih a, amah in a nu hitaleh a pa hitaleh bawnghon lak panin a piak leh, amah in
Tua ciangin amah in a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk kongah go dinga, tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Thunuama biakna panin
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau le a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in mei tunga om sing tunga meihal biakpiakna tau tung mahah hal ding uh hi. Tua pen
“Topa’tungah thunuama a piak ding ama biakna pen tuu le keel honte sung panin a nu hitaleh a pa hitaleh ganhing khat ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo pia ding hi.Topa’
Amah in biak nadingin tuuno khat a piak leh,
a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai-ah go ding hi. Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin thunuama biakna panin
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in
“Ama biakna keel ahihleh, amah in
a lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai-ah go ding hi. Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a gim namtui dingin mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. A thau khempeuh
Tua pen na khang tawntungun na tenna khempeuh uhah note in a thau le sisan na nek loh nadingun a tawntungin ngeina kip hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih lo ding ci-inTopain a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh, mi khatpeuh in theih lohna hangin khial a, tuate khatpeuh a hihkhak leh,Topa

a khial pa pen sathau a kinilh siampipa ahih a, mite tungah tua bangin mawhna hong tut leh, ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a sitbaang lo bawngtalno khatTopa’mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna-in amah piasak un.Topa’
Amah inTopa’mai kikhopna buk kongah a bawngtal paipihin, bawngtal lu tungah a khut nga dinga,Topa’mai-ah a bawngtal go ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in a bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, kikhopna bukah paipih ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a si sungah a khutme diahin, biakbuk dalna puan maiTopa’mai-ah a si kimkhat sagih vei theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin siampipa in kikhopna buk sungTopa’mai-a om paknamtui biakna tau kite a si kimkhat nuhin, kikhopna bukkongah a om meihal biakna tau bulah bawngtal si a omlai teng sung khia ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal thau khempeuh a gilpi tuam a thau le a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding a sintuamte
(thunuama biakna bawngtal panin hihte a kilak mah bangin) la dinga, siampipa in meihal biakna tau tungah tuate hal ding hi.
Ahih hangin bawngtal vun le a sa khempeuh, a lutang, a khete, a sungkuate le a ek tawh,
a bawngtal buppi pua khia-in vut kibuakna, giahphual pualam mun siangtho khatah sing a kicih mei tungah amah in hal dinga, vut a kibuakna munah kihal ding hi.
“Israel mihonte khempeuh in theih lohna hangin khialhna khat gamta-in tua pen mihonte in a phawk kei a, hih lo ding, ci-inTopain a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh amaute in hihin a mawh uhleh,Topa
amau’ gamtatnasa khialhna a kitheih ciangin, khialhna hanga biak nadingin mihonte in bawngtalno khat pia-in kikhopna buk mai-ah paipih ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonte’ upate inTopa’mai, bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,Topa’mai-ah tua bawngtal kigo ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in kikhopna bukah bawngtal si kimkhat paipih dinga,
a si sungah a khutme diahin dalna puan maiTopa’mai-ah sagih vei theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah inTopa’mai kikhopna buk sunga om biakna tau kite tungah a si kimkhat zut dinga, kikhopna bukkongah a om biakna tau bulah si a omlai teng sung ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in a thau khempeuh la-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
Tua bangin a bawngtal hih ding hi. Amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal a hihsa mah bangin hih zong hih ding hi. Siampipa in amau a’ dingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amaute kimaisak ding hi.
Amah in giahphual pua-ah bawngtal pua khia dinga, a masa bawngtal a hal mah bangin a hal ding hi. Tua pen mihonpi adingin khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
“Ukpa khat khialin, hih lo ding, ci-inTopaama Pasian in a thupiakte khempeuh lakah khat peuhpeuh theih lohna hangin hihkha-in a mawh ciangin,Topa
ama gamtatnasa khialhna ama tungah a va kihilh leh, amah in biakna-in a sitbaang lo keel pa khat paipih dinga,
keel lu tungah a khut nga-in,Topa’mai, meihal biakna a kigawh nading munah go ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin siampipa in a khutme tawh khialhna hanga biakna si tawm la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuhin meihal biakna tau bulah a si omlai teng sung ding hi.
Thunuama biakna sathaute mah bangin amah in biakna tau tungah a thau khempeuh hal ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin siampipa in ama khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Hih lo ding, ci-inTopa’thupiakte khat peuhpeuh mi mawkmawk khat in theih lohna hangin hihin a khialh a, a mawh leh,Topa’
ama gamtatnasa a khialhna ama tungah a kihilh ciangin amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin biak nading a sitbaang lo keel a nu khat paipih ding hi.
Amah in a khialhna hanga biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in, meihal biakna munah khialhna hanga biakna gan go ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutme tawh si tawm la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh dinga, biakna tau bulah si a omlai teng sung ding hi.

Thunuama biakna panin a thaute a kilakkhiat mah bangin amah in a thau khempeuh la khia dinga,Topaading a gim namtui dingin siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.Topa
“Amah in khialhna hanga biakna-in a piak dingin tuuno khat a paipih leh, a sitbaang lo a nu khat hi dinga,
khialhna hanga biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in, meihal biakna a kigawhna munah khialhna hanga biak nadingin go ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in khialhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat a khutme tawh la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh dinga, biakna tau bulah a si omlai teng sung ding hi.

Thunuama biakpiakna panin tuuno thau a kilak khiat mah bangin amah in a thau khempeuh la khia dinga,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, biakna tau tungah siampipa in hal ding hi. Siampipa in ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.Topa’
“Mi khatpeuh teci pang dingin a kisap ciangin a muhsa a theihsa thute gen loin a ip leh, amah in tua mawhna pua ding hi.

“Tua ahih kei leh mi khatpeuh in gamlak ganhing nin a sisa hitaleh inn ganhing nin a sisa hitaleh a bokvak a nin ganhing a sisa hitaleh, a muh lohin a nin khat peuhpeuh lawngkha-in amah a nin a suah leh, a mawh hi ding hi.
“Tua ahih kei leh amah in mihing nitna hitaleh, mu loin a lawnkhak leh, a theih ciangin a mawh hi ding hi.

“Tua ahih kei leh mi khatpeuh in a sia bawl ding hitaleh a pha bawl ding hitaleh mite a kiciam theih ngei kiciamna nam khat peuhpeuh ama kam tawh a theih lohin a kiciampak khak leh, a theih ciangin hihte khat peuhpeuhah a mawh hi ding hi.
“Hihte khat peuhpeuhah mi khat a mawh ciangin, amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna pulak dinga,

mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuhon pan ahi a, keelhon pan ahi zongin a nu khat peuhpeuh tuu hitaleh keel hitaleh, a gamtatnasa a khialhna hanginTopa’tungah biakna paipih dinga, siampipa in a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak ding hi.Topa’

“Ahih hangin amah in tuuno khat a piak zawh kei leh a gamtatnasa a khialhna hanginTopa’tungah biakna-in vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin, khat khialhna hanga biakna, a khat meihal biak nadingin paipih ding hi.Topa’
Amah in siampipa tungah tuate paipih dinga, siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nading pen pia masa ding hi. Amah in a ngawng panin a lu heek dinga, ahih hangin heeksat lo ding hi.
Amah in khialhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat biakna tau pangah theh dinga, biakna tau bulah a si omlai teng taaksak ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ngeina kip om bangin meihal biak nadingin a khat pia ding hi. Siampipa in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah in vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin a piak zawh kei leh, amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a biakna-in annel lawh khat, khialhna hanga biak nadingin paipih ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahih manin amah in tua sungah sathau khah lo dinga, paknamtui zong hel lo ding hi.
Amah in siampipa kiangah paipih dinga, siampipa in phawkna-in khutdim khat la-inTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Tua bangin siampipa in hihte khat peuhpeuh a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi. An tawh biakna-a mah bangin a omlai teng siampipa ading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Mi khatpeuh in theih lohna hangin thu palsatinTopa’na a siangtho khat peuhpeuhah a khialh leh, a mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuhon sung panin a sitbaang lo tuutal khat, biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in ngun shekel-in nangmah in a man sehin, amah inTopa’kiangah paipih ding hi. Tua pen mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’Topa’

Amah in a siangtho na a hih khialhna-ah lohkikna zong bawl dinga, seh nga-ah khat gawm behin siampipa tungah pia ding hi. Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawh ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Hih lo ding, ci-inTopa’thupiakte khat peuhpeuh, mi khatpeuh in hihin a khialh leh, a theih lohna hang hitaleh zong, amah a mawh hi veve-in, ama mawhna mah pua ding hi.Topa’

Tuuhon lak pan a sitbaang lo tuutal khat, a manzah ding nangmah in seh inla, amah in mawhna hanga biak nadingin siampipa kiangah paipih ding hi. Theih lohna hanga ama gamtatnasa khialhna hangin siampipa in ama ading kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
Tua penTopa’tungah khial ahih manin mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Mi khatpeuh khialin,Topa’thu palsatin, na kepsakna thu-ah ahi zongin, khapna nate’ thu-ah ahi zongin a veengpa khemin, ahih kei leh a na sutin, a veengpa nengniamin,Topa’
tua ahih kei leh a mang na khat mu-in tua thu-ah zuau-in a man loin kiciam a, mite a khialh theih ngeina khat peuhpeuhah
khialin a mawh ciangin amah in a suhte hitaleh, a netniamna tawh a ngahte hitaleh, amah a kikemsak na hitaleh, a mang na a muh hitaleh,
a man loin a kiciamnasa na khat peuhpeuh hitaleh loh ding hi. Amah in a cingin lohin seh nga-ah khat piak beh dinga, a mawhna hanga biakna a piak ni-in a nei pa tungah pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin a mawhna hanga a biak nading, tuuhon lak pan a sitbaang lo tuutal khat,Topa’tungah a piak ding, a man ding nangma sehzah, amah in siampipa kiangah paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa inTopa’mai-ah ama ading kilemna bawlsak dinga, mi khat a mawh theih ngeina khat peuhpeuhte-ah amah kimaisak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Aaron le a tapate thu pia inla, hih bangin ci in: Hih pen meihal biakna ngeina ahi hi. Meihal biakna pen biakna tau tunga meikhuk tungah zingsang mateng zan tawntung om dinga, tua biakna tau tungah mei kikuangsak den ding hi.
Siampipa in a saihadial puan silhin, a saihadial pheituam teengin, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna mei in a kattum vutte la-in biakna tau pangah koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a puante suahin puan dang silh dinga, giahphual pualam a siangtho mun khatah a vutte pua khia ding hi.

Biakna tau tunga mei kikuangsak den dinga, kimitsak lo ding hi. Siampipa in zingsang simin a tungah sing cihin, meihal biakna a ngeina bangin a tungah koihin, thunuama biakna thau a tungah hal ding hi.
Biakna tau tungah mei kikuangsak tawntung dinga, kimitsak lo ding hi.
“Tua ciangin an tawh biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi. Aaron’ suante in biakna tau mai,Topa’mai-ah pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Mi khat in, biakna tau tungah a om an tawh biakna annel khutdim khat, a sathau le a paknamtui khempeuh tawh la-in,Topaadingin a gim namtui, phawkna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.Topa
Aaron le a tapate in a omlai teng ne ding uh hi. A siangtho mun khatah silngo sawh loh in ne ding uh a, kikhopna buktual sung mun khat hi ding hi.

Tua pen silngo sawhin a ki-em hi lo ding hi. Meihal biakna hong kipiakna sung panin amau’ tanh dingin ka piaksa ahi hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna le mawhna hanga biakna bangin a siangtho pen ahi hi.

Na khang tawntung uha dingin thu hong kipiak mah bangin,Topa’tungah meihal biakna a kipiakna panin Aaron’ suante lakah pasal peuhmah in tuate ne thei ding hi. Tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Aaron le a suante sathau a kinilh ni-inTopa’tungah hih bangin biakna kipia ding hi: An tawh biakna ngeina bangin annel lawh khat, alang zingsangin, alang nitakin pia ding hi.Topa’
Tua pen beelpei tung khatah sathau tawh kibawl ding hi. An tawh biakna mah bangin limtakin helsa le balnensa-in na paipih dinga,Topaading a gim namtui dingin na pia ding hi.Topa
Aaron’ suante sung panin amah a laih dingin sathau a kinilh siampipa in, thu a kipiaksa mah banginTopa’tungah pia dinga, a vekpi-in kihal ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in an tawh a biakna peuhmah a vekpi-in kihal dinga, kine lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Aaron le a tapate tungah hih bangin gen in: Khialhna hanga biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi. Meihal biakna a kigawhna munTopa’mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna kigo dinga, tua pen a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’
Khialhna hanga biakna a pia siampipa in kikhopna buktual sung a siangtho mun khatah ne ding hi.
A sa a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi. Puan tungah a si a kithehkhak ciangin, a siangtho mun khatah tua si a kithehkha pen kisawp ding hi.
Tua ciangin a kihuanna leibeel kisukham ding hi. Ahih hangin taaubeelin a kihuan ahihleh a beel kikiatin tui sungah kisawp siang sitset ding hi.
Siampite’ lak panin pasal peuhmah in ne thei ding uh hi. Tua in a siangtho pen ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin kikhopna buk sungah a kipaipih si a kilak khiatna, khialhna hanga biakna sa kine lo dinga, mei tawh kihal ding hi.
“Mawhna hanga biakna ngeina, a siangtho pen hih bang ahi hi.
Amaute in meihal biakna a gawhna mun uhah mawhna hanga biakna go ding uh a, biakna tau kimkotah a si kitheh ding hi.
Tua ciangin a thau khempeuh, a meithau, a gilpi tuam a thau,
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sin tuamte kipia ding hi.
Topa’tungah meihal biakna-in siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal dinga, tua pen mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Siampite lakah pasal peuhmah in a siangtho mun khatah ne thei ding uh hi; tua in a siangtho pen ahi hi.
“Mawhna hanga biakna pen khialhna hanga biakna tawh kibang a, tuate ading a ngeina a kibang hi dinga, kilemna a bawlsak siampipa in tua biakna sa ngah ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh’ meihal biakna a piaksak siampipa in ama piaksak tua meihal biakna a vun ngah ding hi.
Mei bung sunga a ki-em an tawh biakna peuhmah leh sikbeel daii ahi a, beelpei tungah ahi zongin a kibawl khempeuhte, a pia siampipa in ngah ding hi.
An tawh biakna khempeuh, sathau a kihel hitaleh a kihel lo hita leh, Aaron’ suan khempeuh in a kikimin hawm ding uh hi.
“Mi khatpeuh inTopa’tungah a piak theih ding, thunuama biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi.Topa’
Amah in lungdam kohna-in a piak leh, silngo sawh loh sathau tawh a kihel moh, silngo sawh loh mohpheng sathau tawh a kizut, annel moh sathau limtakin a kihelte, lungdam biakna tawh pia khawm ding hi.
Amah in lungdam koh nadingin thunuama ama biakpiakna tawh silngo kisawh anlum mohte ama biakna-in paipih khawm ding hi.
Amah inTopabiak nadingin tua biakna sung panin moh khat ciat pia ding a, thunuama biakna si a theh siampipa in tua moh ngah ding hi.Topa
Lungdam kohna-in thunuama ama biakpiakna a sa pen a piak ni-in kine dinga, a zingsang dong bangmah kisit lo ding hi.
“Ahih hangin ama biakpiakna pen thuciamna hanga biakpiakna ahi a, utthu-a biakpiakna ahi zongin ahihleh, amah in a biakpiakna a piak ni-in kine dinga, a omlai teng a zing ciangin kine ding hi.
Ahih hangin a ni thum ni-in biakpiakna sa a omlai teng mei tawh kihal ding hi.

A ni thum ni-in thunuama ama biakpiakna sa khat peuhpeuh a kinek leh, tua biakpiakna a piapa kisang lo dinga, tua pen ama a’ in zong kiciamteh lo ding hi. Tua sa a nin hi dinga, a ne pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
“A nin na khat peuhpeuh tawh a kisawhkha sa kine lo dinga, mei tawh kihal ding hi. Ahi zongin a siang mi khempeuh in a sa ne thei ding uh hi.
A nin hi napi-in thunuamaTopa’tungah biakpiakna sa a ne pa ama mipihte’ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’

Mi khatpeuh in mihing nin hitaleh ganhing nin hitaleh a kihhuai a nin khat peuhpeuh hitaleh lawng a, tua khit ciangin thunuamaTopa’tungah biakpiakna sa a nek leh, ama mipihte’ lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi a, keel ahi zongin a thau na ne kei ding uh hi.
A mawk sih ganhing thau leh gamsate in a bal gawp ganhing thaute, na dangin kizang thei dinga, ahih hangin bangbang hileh na ne kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ganhing thau a ne mi peuhmah ama mipihte’ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’
Tua tham loin note in na tenna uh mun khat peuhpeuhah vasa sisan hitaleh ganhing sisan hitaleh si peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi.
Si khat peuhpeuh a ne mi peuhmah ama mipihte’ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in:Topa’tungah thunuama ama biakpiakna a piapa inTopa’kiangah ama biakna paipih ding hi. Thunuama ama biakpiakna paninTopa’Topa’
amah inTopa’tungah meihal biakna a khutin paipih ding hi.Topa’mai-ah vei-a biak nadingin a iik a kivei theih nadingin amah in a thau a iik tawh paipih ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Siampipa in biakna tau tungah a thau hal dinga, ahih hangin a iik pen Aaron le a suante ading hi ding hi.
Thunuama na biakpiakna panin biakna-in siampipa tungah a taklam phei na pia ding uh hi.
Aaron’ suante sung panin thunuama biakna si le a thau a piapa in a taklam phei a ngah ding ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a kivei a iik le a kipia a phei pen keimah in Israel mite’ tung panin thunuama amau’ biakpiakna sung panin la khia-in, Israel mite’ tung panin a tawntungin a ngah dingun siampi Aaron le a suante’ tungah ka pia khinzo hi.
Hih pen,Topa’siampi na a sem dingin amaute a kipiak ni-in,Topa’tungah meihal biakna sung panin amau’ tungah a kipia, Aaron leh a suante’ tanh ahi hi.Topa’Topa’
Israel mite in amaute tungah a piak nadingin amaute sathau a kinilh ni-inTopain hih thu pia a, tua pen a khang tawntungun amau’ kaih ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Hihte pen amau’ biaknateTopa’tungah a piak nadingun amah in Israel mite Sinai sehnel gamah a thupiak ni-inTopain Sinai Mual tungah Moses a thupiak, meihal biakna, an tawh biakna, khialhna hanga biakna, mawhna hanga biakna, ki-apna le thunuama biakna ngeina ahi hi.Topa’Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Aaron le amah tawh a om a tapate, a puante, a nilh sathau, khialhna hanga biakna a bawngtal, a tuutal nihte le silngo sawh loh anlum lawh la inla,
kikhopna bukkongah Israel mihonte khempeuh khawm in,” a ci hi.
Topain amah a thupiak bangin Moses in hih a, kikhopna bukkongah mihonte kikhawm hi.Topa
Moses in mihonte kiangah, “Tu-a ka hih dingte penTopain hih dingin a thupiak ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in Aaron le a tapate paipihin tui tawh amaute a sil hi.
Amah in a puantungsilh amah silhsak a, a kawnggak tawh gakin, a puantualpi silhsak a, a siampi puan silhsakin, siampi puan’ khau, hoihtakin a kigan tawh gak a, tua tawh ama tungah a khih hi.
Amah in ama tungah a awmdal bulhin, a awmdal sungah Urim le Thummim a koih hi.
Amah in Aaron’ lu tungah a dialpi khimsakin, a dialpi tung a mai lamah,Topain Moses a thupiak bangin amah in kham peek, a siangtho kumpi lukhu a khusak hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau la-in, biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh nuhin tuate a ap hi.
Amah in biakna tau tungah tuate kimkhat sagihvei thehin, biakna tau le a nazat khempeuh le kuang le a ngaknate, ap dingin sathau a nuh hi.
Amah in nilh sathau kimkhat Aaron’ tungah sung a, ap dingin amah a sathau a nilh hi.
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin, Moses in Aaron’ tapate paipih a, puantungsilhte silhsakin, kawnggak tawh amaute gak a, amau’ lu tungah lukhute a khih hi.Topa
Tua ciangin amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal paipih a, Aaron le a tapate in tua bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Kilemna bawl nadingin Moses in a bawngtal go a, a si la-in a kiima biakna tau kite a khutme tawh nuhin, biakna tau siangthosak a, biakna tau bulah a site sung khia-in a ap hi.
A sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh le a sintuamte le a kal nihte a thau tawh la-in, biakna tau tungah tuate a hal hi.
Ahih hangin,Topain Moses a thupiak bangin a omlai a vun, a sa le a ek, amah in giahphual pualamah mei tawh a hal hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in meihal biakna tuutal pia a, Aaron le a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Moses in tua tuutal go-in, biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh hi.
Tuutal a kisemnen ciangin, Moses in a lu le a ki-atnente le a thau a hal hi.

Topain Moses a thupiak bangin, a sungkuate le a khete tui tawh a kisawp khit ciangin,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna a gim namtui, meihal biakna-in Moses in biakna tau tungah tuutal buppi a hal hi.TopaTopa’
Tua ciangin Moses in a tuutal dang, kipsakna tuutal pia a, Aaron leh a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Moses in tuutal go a, a si tawmkhat la-in Aaron’ taklam bilteep leh a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuh hi.
Aaron’ tapate hong kipaipih a, Moses in amau’ taklam bilteepte le amau’ taklam khutpite le amau’ taklam khepite a si tawmkhat nuh a, a si a val laite, biakna tau tung kimkotah a theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a thau, a mei thau le a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh le a sintuamte, a kal nihte le a thau le a taklam phei a la hi.
Topa’mai-ah a om silngo sawh loh anlum lawh sung panin amah in silngo sawh loh moh khat le sathau sawh anlum moh khat le mohpheng khat la-in, a thau tung le a taklam phei tungah tuate a koih hi.Topa’
Amah in hihte khempeuh, Aaron le a tapate’ khut sungah koih a, amaute in vei-a biakna-inTopa’mai-ah tuate a vei uh hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Moses in amaute’ khut sung panin tuate la-in,Topa’tungah meihal biakpiakna, a gim namtui, kipsakna biakna-in biakna tau tungah meihal biakna tawh tuate a hal khawm hi.Topa’
Moses in a iik la-in vei-a biakna-inTopa’mai-ah a vei hi.Topain Moses a thupiak bangin tua pen kipsakna tuutal panin Moses’ tanh ahi hi.Topa’Topa

Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau kimkhat le biakna tau tunga om a si la-in, Aaron le ama tapate le amau’ puante tungah a theh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Aaron le ama tapate, a puante uh tawh a apkhawm hi.

Moses in Aaron le a tapate kiangah, “Keimah in thu hong pia-in, ‘Aaron le a tapate in ne ding uh hi,’ ka cih mah bangin, kikhopna buk kongah a sa huan unla, tua lai munah tua sa le kipsakna biakna lawh sungah a om anlum ne unla,
a sa le anlum na khamvalte uh mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
Note hong kikipsak nading hun ni sagih sung hi ding ahih manin, note hong kikipsakna hun a cin mateng, kikhopna bukkong pua-ah ni sagih sung na pai khia kei ding uh hi.
Tuni-a kibawl bangin, note adingin kilemna bawl ding,Topain thu hong pia khin hi.Topa

Kikhopna bukkongah ni sagih sung sun le zan na om ding uh a,Topa’hong sawlte na hih ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh note na si ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang dingin keima tungah thu hong kipia hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin Aaron le a tapate in zong,Topain Moses’ tungtawnin a thupiakte khempeuh a hih uh hi.Topa
A ni giat ni-in Moses in Aaron le a tapate le Israel upate a sam hi.
Amah in Aaron’ kiangah, “Khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawng pano khat le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat, a nih tuakin a sitbaang lo, la inla,Topa’mai-ah tuate pia in.Topa’
Israel mite kiangah, ‘Khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat le meihal biak nadingin bawngno khat le tuuno khat, a nih tuakin kum khat pha-in a sitbaang lo,

le thunuama biakna-inTopa’mai-ah piak dingin bawngtal khat le tuutal khat le sathau tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna la un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-in note tungahTopahong kilang ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa
Amaute in zong kikhopna buk mai-ah Moses’ thupiak teng hong paipih uh a, mihonpite khempeuh a nai-ah hong pai-inTopa’mai-ah ding uh hi.Topa’
Moses in, “Note tungahTopa’minthanna vang hong kilat theih nadinginTopain hih bangin thu hong pia hi,” a cih khit cianginTopa’Topa

Aaron’ kiangah, “Topa’thupiaksa bangin biakna tau mai-ah pai-in khialhna hanga biakna le meihal biakna pia inla, nangma ading le mite adingin kilemna bawl in. Mite’ biakna paipih inla, amaute adingin kilemna bawlsak in,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin Aaron in biakna tau naihin, ama a’ mahmah ding ahi khialhna hanga biakna bawngno a go hi.
Aaron’ tapate in ama tungah a si pia uh a, amah in a si sungah a khutme diahin biakna tau kite nuh a, biakna tau bulah a si vallai teng a sung khia hi.
Ahih hangin,Topain Moses a thupiak bangin khialhna hanga biakna panin a thau le a kalte le a sintuamte biakna tau tungah a hal hi.Topa
A sa le a vunte ahihleh giahphual pualamah mei tawh a hal hi.
Tua ciangin a meihal biakna a go hi. A tapate in ama tungah a si pia uh a, amah in biakna tau tung kimkotah a theh hi.
Amaute in meihal biakna ama tungah a nen nenin a lutang tawh pia uh a, amah in biakna tau tungah tuate a hal hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a sungkuate le a khete sawp a, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna tawh tuate a halkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a masa-a khialhna hanga biakna mah bangin amah in mite’ biakna pia-in, mite ading ahi khialhna hanga biakna keel la-in go a, khialhna hanga biak nadingin a pia hi.
Tua ciangin meihal biakna paipihin ngeina kip omsa bangin a pia hi.
Amah in zingsang a meihal biakna banah biakna paipihin, tua sung panin a khutdim la-in, biakna tau tungah a hal hi.
Moses’ thupiak bangin amah in mite adingin thunuama biakna bawngtal le tuutal zong a go hi. A tapate in ama kiangah a si paipih uh a, amah in biakna tau kimkotah theh a,
bawngtal le tuutal thau, a mei thau, a gilpi tuam, a kalte, a sintuamte
le a thau, amaute in a iikte tungah koihin, amah in biakna tau tungah a thau a hal hi.
Ahih hangin Aaron in a iikte le a taklam pheite,Topa’mai-ah vei-a biakna-in a vei hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Aaron in mite’ lamah a khutte laamto-in thupha a piak khit ciangin khialhna hanga biakna le meihal biakna le thunuama biakna a piakna panin hong paisuk hi.
Kikhopna buk sungah Moses le Aaron hong tum uh a, hong pusuah khiat ciangun mite thupha pia a, mi khempeuh tungahTopa’minthanna vang hong kilang hi.Topa’
Topa’mai panin mei hong piang khia-in meihal biakna le biakna tau tunga om sathau a kang hi. Mi khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin awng uh a, lei maingatin a kunsuk uh hi.Topa’

Tu-in Aaron’ tapate Nadab le Abihu in amau’ paknamtui beel tuak la-in, a sungah mei koih uh a, a tungah paknamtui koihin,Topain amau’ tungah tua banga thu a piak ngei loh a siang lo mei,Topa’mai-ah a pia uh hi.TopaTopa’
Topa’omna mun panin mei hong pai khia-in amaute kaang a,Topa’mai-ah a si uh hi.Topa’Topa’

Tua ciangin Moses in Aaron’ kiangah, “Topain, ‘Ka kiang nai-a a omte kiangah keimah a siangtho-in ka kilak dinga, mi khempeuh’ mai-ah keimah hong kiminthangsak ding hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. Aaron pau loin a om hi.Topa
Moses in Aaron’ pa’ sanggampa Uzziel’ tapate Mishael le Elizafan samin amaute kiangah, “Hong pai unla biakbuk panin giahphual pualamah na sanggamte uh pua khia un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in hong naihin, Moses’ sawl bangin giahphual pualamah amau’ puantungsilh mah uh tawh amaute a pua khia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Aaron le a tapate Eleazar le Ithamar kiangah, “Na lu uha na sam uh phiahsak kei unla, na puante uh balkek kei un. Tua bangin na hih uhleh note si-in, mihon khempeuh tungahTopa’hehna hong tung ding hi. Ahih hangin na mipih uh, Israel mihon buppi pen,Topa’mei in a katlup mite’ hangin dahin kap thei ding uh hi.Topa’Topa’
Kikhopna buk kong panin a pualamah pai khia kei un. Na pai uhleh na si ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’nilh sathau note’ tungah om hi,” a ci hi. Moses’ gen bangin amaute a gamta uh hi.Topa’
Topain Aaron kiangah,Topa

“Nang hitaleh na tapate hitaleh kikhopna bukah na pai uh ciangin leenggahzu hitaleh khamtheih zu hitaleh ne kei un. Na nek uhleh na si ding uh hi. Tua pen na suan na khakte uh tungah khang tawntungin ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
Note in a siangtho le a mawkmawk le a nin le a siang na khen ding uh hi.
Topain Moses tungtawnin amaute’ tunga a gensa thukhamte khempeuh note in Israel mite a hilh ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Moses in Aaron le a omlai a tapate Eleazar le Ithamar kiangah, “Topa’tungah meihal biakna sung panin a vallai ahi an tawh biakna la unla, tua pen a siangtho pen ahih manin silngo sawh lohin biakna tau gei-ah ne un.Topa’
Tua an penTopa’tungah meihal biaknate lak panin nang le na tapate’ kaih ding ahih manin a siangtho mun khatah na ne ding uh hi. Tua bang ding mahin kei’ tungah thu hong kipia hi.Topa’

Ahih hangin a kivei a iik le a kipia a pheite pen nang le na tapate le na tanute in a siangtho mun khatpeuhah ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen Israel mite in thunuama a biakpiakna panun nang le na tapate’ kaih dinga hong kipia ahi hi.

Topain a thupiaksa bangin a kipia a phei le a kivei a iikte ahihlehTopa’mai-ah vei-a biakna-in vei dingin amaute in meihal biakna sathau tawh hong paipih ding uh a, tua pen nang le na tapate in a tawntungin na kaih ding uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa’
Tu-in Moses in khialhna hanga biakna keel tawh kisai thu limtakin kan a, na kihal khin mawk hi. Aaron’ tapa a omlai Eleazar le Ithamar-te’ tungah amah heh a,

“Note in mihonte adinginTopa’mai-ah kilemna bawlin, amau’ mawhna a kilakkhiat theih nadingin note’ tungah hong kipiasa a siangtho sa pen khialhna hanga biakna hi napi, bang hangin a siangtho mun khatah ne lo na hi uh hiam?Topa’
En un, biakbuk sungah a sisan kipaipih lo hi. Ka thupiaksa bangin note in biakbuk sungah na nek dingun a kilawm ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Aaron in Moses kiangah, “En in, tuni-in amaute inTopa’mai-ah amau’ khialhna hanga biakna le amau’ meihal biakna pia khinzo uh hi. Tua bang hinapi hih bang thute kei’ tungah hong tung veve hi. Khialhna hanga biakna tuni-in a ne hi leng,Topa’muhna-ah sanhuai ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa’Topa’
Moses in tua thu a zak ciangin a lungkim hi.
Topain Moses le Aaron tungah,Topa
“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen un: Hihte pen leitunga om ganhing khempeuh lak panin na nek theih ding uh a nungta ganhing ahi hi.
Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin eknel haite lak pan hitaleh khecin-kate lak pan hitaleh, note in na nek theih loh dingte uh: Kalaoh in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note adingin a nin ahi hi.
Sakikh ganhing in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note adingin a nin ahi hi.
Bilpi in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note adingin a nin ahi hi.
Vok pen khecin ka ahih hangin eknel hai lo ahih ciangin note adingin a nin ahi hi.
Note in tuate’ sa na ne kei ding uh a, a sisate zong na lawng kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen note adingin a nin ahi hi.
“Tui sunga omte sung panin nek theih dingte: Tuipi sung hitaleh gun sung hitaleh tui sungah a om phe le lip a neite peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tuipi sung, gun sunga om phe le lip a nei lo, tui sunga a hontat ganhingte le tui sunga a nungta ganhingte pen note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Tuate pen note adingin a kihhuai hi ding hi. Note in tuate’ sa na ne kei ding uh a, a sisate zong na kih ding uh hi.
Tui sunga a omte sung panin phe le lip a nei lo peuhmah note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Vasate lak panin note in na kih ding uh, a kine lo ding, a kihhuaite: Muvanlai, mupi, luimu,
mumeika, musan nam khempeuh,
va-ak nam khempeuh,
vasa-kalaoh, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh,
keising, tuimu, gun vakang,
gam vatawt, tui vatawt, musane,
gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh, huihtun le bak ahi hi.
“Khe li tawh a pai, kha a nei ganhing khempeuhte, note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ahi zongin khe li tawh a pai, kha a nei ganhingte khempeuh lak panin leitungah a tuan nadingun a khepek uh tawh kizom ngaltak tawn a neite na ne thei ding uh hi.
Tuate lak panin na nek theih dingte uh: Kauphe kitom nam khempeuh, kauphe zol nam khempeuh, khuangbai nam khempeuh le kauphe kisau nam khempeuh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin khe li nei-in kha a nei ganhing dangte khempeuh note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Hihte tawh note a nin na suak ding uh hi. A sisa a lawng peuhmahte a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga,
a sisa themkhat a pua peuhmah in a puan sawpin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A khecin a ka ahih hangin eknel a hai lo ganhing peuhmah note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Khe li tawh a pai ganhingte khempeuh lak panin amau’ khebom tawh a paite khempeuh note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate a sisa a lawngkha peuhmahte a nitak dong a nin hi dinga,
a sisa a puapa in a puan sawpin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Tuate note adingin a nin ahi hi.
“Leitungah a vak kawikawi, a pai thei ganhingte lak panin note adingin a ninte: Savokphual, zusa, innhikpi nam khempeuh,
tawlbawkpi, tang, tangteuh le sehnel gam thankik ahi hi.
A hontat ganhing khempeuhte lak panin hihte pen note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate a sisa a lawng peuhmah a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.

Tuate a sisa khat peuhpeuh a tukna nate, sing nazat, puan, savun, ippi le na khat peuhpeuhin a kizang beel khat peuhpeuh hitaleh a nin hi ding hi. Tuate pen tui sungah kidiah dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Tua khit ciangin a siang hi ding hi.
Tuate khat peuhpeuh leibeel khat peuhpeuh sungah a kiat leh, tua sunga om khempeuh a nin hi dinga, note in tua beel na sukham ding uh hi.
Tua leibeel sungah a om a kine thei ding an tungah tua bang tui a tuk leh a nin hi ding hi. Tua bang beel sunga om dawn theih ding peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Tua bang a sisa themkhat a tukna peuhmah a nin hi ding hi. Meibung hitaleh beelpei hitaleh kisuzan ding hi. Tuate a nin hi a, note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ahi zongin tuinak le tuibeem ahihleh a siang hi dinga, ahih hangin a sisate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
A kivawh ding khaici tungah tua a sisate themkhat a tuk leh, tua khaici a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin khaici tui kidiah a, tua a sisate themkhat tua khaici tungah a tuk leh, note adingin tua khaici a nin ahi hi.
“Note’ nek theih ding ganhing khat peuhpeuh a sih leh a sisa a lawng pa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga,
a sisa a ne pa in ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. A sisa a puapa in zong ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
“Leitungah a hontat ganhing peuhmah a kihhuai hi a, tuate kine lo ding hi.
A awmtal peuhmah le khe li-a a pai peuhmah, ahih kei leh khe tampi a nei, leitungah a pai a hontat ganhing khempeuh, note in na ne kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a kihhuai ahi hi.
A hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nomau mah a kihhuai-in na kibawltawm kei ding uh a, tuate tawh nomau na kininsak tawm kei ding uh hi. Na kinitsak tawm uhleh a nin na suak ding uh hi.

Kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla, kei siangtho ka hih manin note zong siangtho un. Leitungah a bokvak a hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh note na kininsak tawm kei ding uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa pen keimahTopaka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei siangtho ka hih manin note na siangtho ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Hih pen a nin le a siang, a nungta ganhing nek theih ding le nek theih loh ding khen nadingin ganhing le vasa, tui sunga a pai a nungta ganhing khempeuh le leitungah a hontat ganhing khempeuh tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Nupi khat gai-in ta pasal a neih leh ni sagih sung tua nu a nin hi dinga, a nin neih huna mah bangin amah a nin hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in a naungek vun dawn ki-at ding hi.

Tua ciangin nupi in ama si luanna hangin a sian nadingin ni sawmthum le ni thum sung omlai ding hi. Amah in kisiansuahna ni a cin mateng a siangtho na khat peuhpeuh lawng loin, biakbuk sungah zong tum lo ding hi.
“Ahih hangin amah in ta numei a neih leh, ama nin neih huna mah bangin nipikal nih sung a nin hi ding hi. Ama si luanna hangin a sian nadingin ni sawmguk le ni guk sung omlai ding hi.

“Amah a kisiansuahna hun a cin ciangin tapa ading hitaleh tanu ading hitaleh, amah in kikhopna bukkong a siampipa kiangah meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno khat le khialhna hanga biak nadingin kawl vakhuno khat ahi a, vakhu khat ahi zongin pia dinga,

siampipa inTopa’mai-ah pia-in, ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi. Tua ciangin ama si luanna panin tua nu a siang hi ding hi. Hih pen ta pasal hitaleh ta numei hitaleh a nei nu adingin ngeina ahi hi.Topa’

“Tua nu in tuuno a piak zawh kei leh vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin paipih dinga, khat pen meihal biak nading, adang khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading ahi hi. Siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, tua nu a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses le Aaron kiangah,Topa

“Mi khat in ama pumpi vun tungah a bawk ahi a, meima ahi a, a mel tuampian ahi zongin a neih a, tua pen ama pumpi vun tungah phaknatna a suah leh, tua pa pen siampipa kiang ahi a, ama tapa siampi khat peuhpeuh kiangah ahi zongin kipaipih ding hi.

Siampipa in ama pumpi vun tunga natna mun vel ding hi. A natna munah a om a multe kangin ama vun sangin a natna thuktum zaw-in a kimuh leh, tua pen phaknatna hi a, siampipa in a vel khit ciangin amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin ama pumpi vun sungah a natna mun kang napi-in, a vun sangin a thuk lo zaw bangin omin, tua sungah a multe kang loin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung cina pa khumcip ding hi.
Siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel dinga, a natna noptuamin, a natna in a vun sung lawh lo hi ci-in a muh leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung mah khumcip lai ding hi.

Siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah velkik dinga, a natna mun mualin, a vun sung a lawh kei leh, siang hi, ci-in siampipa in gen ding hi. Tua pen meima mawkmawk hi lel a, amah in a puante sawpin a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a sian nadingin siampipa kiangah a kilah khit ciangin a meima in a vun sung a lawh leh siampipa mai-ah kilakkik ding hi.
Siampipa in vel dinga, a meima in a vun sung a lawh leh phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Mi khat in meima a neih ciangin siampipa kiangah kipaipih ding hi.
Siampipa in vel dinga, a vun sungah a bawk kang omin, tua in a multe kangsakin a bawk sungah ma thak a om leh,
tua pen ama pumpi vun sungah a om luisa phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Amah a nin ahih manin khumcip lo ding hi.
Siampipa’ muh theihna ciangah tua natna in a vun phukhamin, tua natna a veipa’ vun khempeuh a lutang panin a khe dongin a lawh khit leh,
siampipa in vel dinga, a natna in a pumpi khempeuh a lawh khit leh siampipa in tua natna tawh kisai-in amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi. A pumpi-in kang khin ahih manin amah a siang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin ama tungah ma thak a kilat ciangin amah a nin hi ding hi.
Siampipa in a ma thak velin, amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ma thak pen phaknatna ahih manin a nin ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a ma thak pen kikheel kikin a kang a suah leh, siampipa kiangah pai dinga,
siampipa in amah velin a natna pen a kang a suah leh, siampipa in natna a veipa siang hi, ci-in gen dinga, amah a siang hi ding hi.
“Mi khatpeuh’ pumpi vun sungah a damsa meimatum khat om a,
a meimatum munah a bawk kang ahi a, a san kang mun ahi zongin a om leh, siampipa kiangah kilak ding hi.
Siampipa in vel dinga, tua pen a vun sangin thuk zaw-in a multe a kang a suah leh, siampipa in amah nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Tua pen phaknatna hi a, meimatum sung tawnin hong phu khia ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa in velin, tua tunga a multe kang loin a vun sangin a thuk zawk kei a, mualin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung khumcip ding hi.
Tua in a vun sung a lawh leh phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin a natna mun pen mun khat bekah omin a kilawh kei leh meimatum pawn hi a, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Tua ahih kei leh, pumpi in a vun tungah mei kaangma khat nei-in tua mei kaangma a thak mun pen a san kang ahi a, a kang ahi zongin hong suah leh,

siampipa in vel ding hi. Tua mun a om a multe kangin a vun sangin a natna a thuk zawk leh, tua pen phaknatna ahi hi. Tua pen mei kaangma tawnin hong phu khia hi a, phaknatna ahih manin siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa in velin, tua mun a multe kang loin a vun sangin a thuk zawk kei a, mualin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung khumcip ding hi.
Siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel ding hi. Tua in a vun sung a lawh leh phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin a natna mun pen mun khat bekah omin a vun sung lawh loin mualin a om leh, tua pen mei kaangma pan a bawk hi a, mei kaangma pawn ahih manin siampipa in amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin a lutang tung ahih kei leh a kha-ah meima khatpeuh a neih ciangin,

siampipa in tua natna vel ding hi. Tua natna pen a vun sangin thuk zaw-in a kimuh a, a sunga a multe eng-in a mal a neu leh, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Tua pen cithak ahi, lu-phak ahih kei leh kha-phak natna ahi hi.
Siampipa in cithak natna velin, a vun sangin thuk zaw lo bangin kimu-in tua sungah mul vom a om kei leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung cithak natna tawh tua pa khumcip dinga,
a ni sagih ni-in siampipa in a natna vel ding hi. A cithak kilawh loin, a sungah mul eng om loin, a cithak pen a vun sangin thuk zaw loin a kimuh leh,
amah le amah a mul kikiat dinga, ahih hangin a cithak san kiat lo ding hi. Siampipa in adang ni sagih sung mah cithak natna tawh tua pa khum ding hi.

A ni sagih ni-in siampipa in a cithak vel dinga, a cithak in a vun sung lawh loin, a vun sangin a thuk lo zaw-in a kimuh leh, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Amah in ama puante sawp dinga, a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a kisiansak khit ciangin a cithak in a vun sung a lawh leh,
siampipa in vel dinga, a cithak in a vun sung a lawh takpi leh, siampipa in mul eng a zon ding kisam lo hi; amah a nin ahi hi.
Ahih hangin ama mitah, cithak noptuam zo hi, ci-in mu a, a sungah mul vom po-in a cithak a dam leh, amah a siang hi a, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, a pumpi vun tungah a mel tuampian a kang mun a neih leh,
siampipa in vel dinga, a pumpi vun tunga om a tuampian munte pen a kang milmial ahihleh, tua pen vun a phukham meima hi a, amah a siang hi ding hi.
“Mi khat a sam pulh a, a lu a tol hangin amah a siang ahi hi.
Mi khat a taltang le a paang panin a sam le a mul a pulh leh, amah a talkolh hi lel a, amah a siang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a lutol tung hitaleh a talkolh tung hitaleh a san kang meima a om leh, tua pen a lutol tung ahih kei leh a talkolh tunga a suak khia phaknatna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amah vel dinga, a bawk natna pen a lutol tung hitaleh a talkolh tung hitaleh a pumpi vun tunga phak om tawh kibangin a san kang ahihleh,
amah pen miphak hi a, a nin ahih manin siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in a gen kul hi; a lutang tungah ama natna a om ahi hi.
“Tua natna a nei mi phakpa in puankekte silhin a sam phiahsak dinga, amah in a muk humin, ‘Nin, nin!,’ ci-in kiko ding hi.
Amah in a natna a neih laiteng a nin hi ding hi. Amah a nin ahih manin giahphual pualam mun khatah amah guak teeng ding hi.
“Samul puan hitaleh saihadial puan hitaleh, puan khat peuhpeuh tungah phaknatna a om ciang,
tua saihadial puan, samul puante, a tung le a pheite’ tung hitaleh, savun le savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om ciangin,

tua natna pen a hing melin ahi a, a san melin ahi zongin puan tungah a kilat ciang, puan a tunga phei tung hitaleh savun le savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om ciangin, tua pen phaknatna hi a, siampipa kiangah kilak ding hi.
Siampipa in a natna vel dinga, tua natna a banna na pen ni sagih sung koihcip ding hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a ni sagih ni-in a natna velkik ding hi. A natna pen puan tungah kizelin, puan a tunga phei-ah hitaleh, savun le savun a kizatna na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om leh, tua natna pen a lauhuai phaknatna hi a, a nin ahi hi.

Amah in a puan hal ding hi. Tua natna pen puan a tunga phei-ah hitaleh, samul puan saihadial puan hitaleh savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om leh hal ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen a lauhuai phaknatna ahih manin mei sungah kihal ding hi.
“Siampipa in velin, a natna pen puan tung, a tunga phei-ah hitaleh, savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a kizelh kei leh,
siampipa in tua natna a banna pen amaute in a sawp ding uh thu pia dinga, amah in adang ni sagih sung mah tua na koihcip ding hi.

Siampipa in tua natna a banna pen a kisawp khit ciangin vel ding hi. Tua natna a banna mun a mel a kikheel kei leh, a natna a kizelh loh hangin tua pen a nin mah ahi hi. Tua natna pen a sunglamah ahi a, a pualamah ahi zongin a baan leh mei sungah tua puan na hal ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin siampipa in vel a, a kisawp khit ciangin a meima a mualh leh, amah in a puan tung pan hitaleh savun tung pan hitaleh a puan a tunga phei tung pan hitaleh natna a banna mun bal khia ding hi.
Tua ciangin a puan tung hitaleh puan a tunga phei tungah hitaleh savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a kilatkik leh, tua natna a kizel ahih manin natna a banna pen mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin a puan hitaleh puan a tunga phei hitaleh savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh a kisawp khit ciangin tua natna a pai khiatna na pen, a nih veina kisawp kikin a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih pen samul puan hitaleh saihadial puan hitaleh puan a tung hitaleh a phei hitaleh, savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om phaknatna tawh kisai-in siang hiam, nin hiam, ci-in khen nading ahi hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Hih pen amah a kisiansak ni-in mi phakpa’ zuih ding ngeina hi ding hi. Siampipa kiangah amah kipaipih dinga,
giahphual pualamah siampipa pai khia-in vel ding hi. Tua ciangin a phaknatna pen a phakpa’ tung pan a dam leh,
a kisiangsak ding mipa adingin a hing vasa siang nih le taamtak sing le a ausan puan le puknah a la dingin siampipa in amaute sawl ding hi.
Amaute in leibeel khat sunga kikoih tuiluang tungah a vasa khat a gawh ding uh siampipa in thu pia ding hi.
Amah in a hing lai vasa pen taamtak sing le a ausan puan le puknah tawh la khawmin, tuate le a hing lai vasa pen tuiluang tunga kithat vasa’ si sungah diah ding hi.
Amah in phaknatna panin a kisiangsak ding pa’ tungah sagihvei theh dinga, tua ciangin amah siang hi, ci-in gen dinga, a hing vasa pen gamlakah khah ding hi.

A kisiangsak ding mipa in a puante sawpin, a mul khempeuh metkhia-in, tui sungah a mahmah kisilin, amah a siang hi ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah giahphual ah hong ciah dinga, ahih hangin ama puanbuk pualamah ni sagih sung om ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in amah in a sam, a khamul le a mitkhu mul le a pum tungah a om a mul khempeuh met khia ding hi. Tua ciangin amah in a puante sawpin, tui sungah a pumpi silin, amah a siang hi ding hi.
“A ni giat ni-in amah in a sitbaang lo tuuno a pa nih le a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a nu khat le an tawh biakna ahi sathau tawh annel lawh thum le sathau biingta khat la ding hi.
Amah a siangsak ding siampipa in a kisiangsak ding mipa le hih nate, kikhopna bukkong aTopa’mai-ah paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in tuuno a pa khat la-in sathau biingta khat tawh mawhna hanga biakna-in pia-in, vei-a biakna-inTopa’mai-ah tuate vei ding hi.Topa’

Amaute in khialhna hanga biakna le meihal biakna, siangtho mun sunga a gawhna mun uhah amah in tuuno go ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna hanga biakna pen khialhna hanga biakna mah bangin siampipa a’ hi a, tua pen a siangtho pen ahi hi.
Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat la-in, tua si pen a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuh ding hi.
Tua ciangin sathau biingta panin kimkhat la-in a mahmah’ veilam khut sungah sungin,
a veilam khutsunga om sathau sungah a taklam khutme diahin, a khutme tawh a sathau kimkhatteTopa’mai-ah sagihvei theh ding hi.Topa’
Ama khut sungah a omlai sathau kimkhatte pen siampipa in a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuhin, mawhna hanga biakna si tungah koih ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutsunga sathau omlai teng a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ lu nilh ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in ama adinginTopa’mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.Topa’
“A nitna panin a kisiangthosak ding mipa ading kilemna bawl nadingin siampipa in a khialhna hanga biakna pia ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in meihal biakna go dinga,
meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate, biakna tau tungah pia ding hi. Tua bangin siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah a siang hi ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah zawngin tuazah a piak zawh kei leh, ama ading kilemna bawl nadingin a kivei ding, mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuno a pa khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh khat le sathau biingta khat pia dinga,
vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin, a piak zawh bangbang pia ding hi. Khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading hi a, a khat pen meihal biak nading ahi hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah inTopa’mai, kikhopna bukkong, siampipa kiangah ama kisianthosak nadingin tuate paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna tuuno le a sathau biingta khat la-in, vei-a biakna-inTopa’mai-ah tuate vei ding hi.Topa’
Amah in mawhna hanga biakna tuuno go ding hi. Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat la-in, a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuh ding hi.
Siampipa in a mahmah’ veilam khut sungah a sathau kimkhat sung dinga,
a veilam khutsunga a om sathau tawmkhat a taklam khutme tawhTopa’mai-ah sagihvei theh ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in ama khutsunga a om sathau tawmkhat a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, taklam khutpi le a taklam khepite, mawhna hanga biakna si a kikoihna munah va nuh ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutsunga a omlai sathau teng a kisiangthosak ding mipa adingTopa’mai-ah kilemna bawl nadingin a lu nilhsak ding hi.Topa’
Amah in vakhu hitaleh kawl vakhuno hitaleh, a piak zawh bangbang pia-in,
khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading, a khat pen meihal biak nadingin an-a biakna tawh pia khawm ding hi. Siampipa in a kisiangthosak pa adinginTopa’mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.Topa’
Hih pen phaknatna a vei, a kisianthosak nadingin biakna a pia zo lopa adingin ngeina ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses le Aaron kiangah,Topa
“Note adingin kong piak Kanaan gamah na om ciangun note’ leitang a inn khat sungah phaknatna kong tunsak ciangin,
inn nei pa pai-in siampipa kiangah, ‘Ka inn sungah natna nam khat a om ding tawh kibang,’ ci ding hi.

Tua ciangin, inn sunga om na khempeuh a nin hi, a kicih khak loh nadingin a natna a vel dingin siampipa a pai ma-in amaute in tua inn a na hawmsak nading uh thu pia dinga, tua khit ciangin inn vel dingin siampipa pai ding hi.
Amah in a natna vel ding hi. A natna pen tua inn kawm tungah omin, a hing mel ahih kei leh a san mel na pua-in, tua natna kawm maitang sangin a thuk zawk tuak leh,
inn sung panin innkongah siampipa pai khia dinga, ni sagih sung inn khakcip ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in siampipa hong paikikin en ding hi. Tua inn kawm tungah a natna a kizelh leh,
natna a banna suang la khia-in khuapi pualam a nin mun khatah a paipih nadingun siampipa in thu pia ding hi.
Amah in a inn sung kimkot kiatsakin, amaute in a kiatkhiat, a kizutna themte, khuapi pualam a nin mun khatah bua ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in suang dang la-in, tua suangte’ omna munah koihin, amah in zutna dang la-in tua inn zut ding hi.
“Amah in a suangte la khia-in a inn kiatin a zut khit ciangin tua inn sungah natna hong suahkik leh,
siampipa pai-in en ding hi. Inn sungah a natna a kizelh leh, tua pen inn sunga om a lauhuai phaknatna hi a, tua inn a nin ahi hi.
Amah in tua inn, a sing a suang le inn a kizutnate khempeuh phel dinga, khuapi pualam a nin mun khatah tuate pua khia ding hi.
Tua tham loin tua inn a kikhakcip sungteng a sungah a lut mipa a nitak dong a nin hi ding hi.
Tua inn sungah a lum mipa le an a ne mipa in ama puante sawp ding hi.
“Ahih hangin siampipa hong pai-in a vel a, a inn a kizut khit ciangin inn sungah natna a kizelh kei leh, tua ciangin a natna dam ahih manin siampipa in tua inn siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Tua inn siangthosak nadingin amah in vasa neu nih, taamtak sing le a ausan khau le puknah tawh la khawmin,
beel sunga kikoih tui luang tungah a vasa khat go dinga,
taamtak sing le puknah le a ausan khau pen a vasa hing tawh la khawmin, tua pen a kigo vasa’ si le tuiluang sungah diahin, tua inn sagihvei theh ding hi.
Tua bangin amah in vasa si tawh, tuiluang tawh, a hing vasa tawh, taamtak sing le puknah le a ausan khau tawh a inn siangsak dinga,
vasa hing pen khuapi pualam gamlakah khah khia ding hi. Tua bangin amah in tua inn adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, tua inn a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih pen phaknatna khat peuhpeuh tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi: Cithak tawh kisai,
puan tung hitaleh inn sung hitaleh ah a om phaknatna tawh kisai,
a bawk hitaleh meima hitaleh a tuampian’ khat peuhpeuh tawh kisai-in,
bang hunin nin a, bang hunin siang hiam, ci-in lah nading ahi hi. Hih pen phaknatna tawh kisai ngeina ahi hi.
Topain Moses le Aaron kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Pasal khatpeuh, a natui a pai khiat ciangin tua a pai khia a natui pen a nin ahi hi.
Amah a ninsak a natui pai khia tawh kisai-in ngeina hih bang ahi hi: A natui a paipai a, a khawl zongin, ama sungah nitna mah hi veve hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa’ lupna le a tutna peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa’ tutnasa na khat peuhpeuh tungah a tu mi peuhmah in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa’ pumpi a lawng mi peuhmah in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa in a siang mipa’ tungah cil a siat leh, tua pa in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa a tutna tutphah khat peuhpeuh zong a nin hi ding hi.
Ama nuai-ah a om na khat peuhpeuh a lawng mipa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Tua bang na a pua mipa in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa in tui sungah a khut sil lopi-in a lawn mi peuhmah in ama puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa in a lawn lei tawh kibawl umlebeelte kisukham dinga, sing tawh kibawl kuanglekeute ahihleh tui sungah kisawp ding hi.
“A natui a pai khia mipa a natui a kan ciangin a kisiansak nadingin amah in ni sagih sung ngak dinga, tua ciangin a puante sawpin, tuiluang sungah a pumpi sil dinga, a siang hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhuno nih la-in,Topa’mai kikhopna bukkongah pai-in, siampipa tungah tuate pia ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in tuate, khat khialhna hanga biak nading le adang khat meihal biak nadingin pia dinga, a natui a pai khia mipa adingin siampipa inTopa’mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.Topa’
“Mi khat in a natui a teh leh, amah in a pumpi khempeuh tui sungah sil dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A tungah a natui a tukna puan le savun peuhmah tui tawh kisawp dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Pasal le numei a lupkhawm khit ciangin, amau tegel tui sungah kisil ding uh a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding uh hi.
“Numei khat in nin a neih ciangin, ni sagih sung a ninin om dinga, amah a lawng mi peuhmah a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Amah a nit hun sungin a lupna le a tutna peuhpeuh a nin hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puan sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ama tutna a lawng peuhmah in ama puante sawp dinga, tui sungah a mahmah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ama tutna ahi lupna hitaleh na khat peuhpeuh hitaleh, mi khat in a lawn ciangin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Pasal khat peuhmah tua nu tawh lumin, tua nu’ nitna ama tungah a om leh, ni sagih sung tua pa a nin hi dinga, tua pa’ lupna peuhmah zong a nin hi ding hi.

“Numei khat in ama nit hun hi lo napi-in ni tampi sung a si a suak ahi a, ama nit hun sung khengin nin nei-in ahi zongin a om leh, a ninneih sung khempeuh, ama nit hun sung mah bangin a nin hi ding hi.
Ama ninneih hun sung tengin a tutna khempeuh zong a nit sungin ama lupna tawh kibang dinga, amah a nin ahih mah bangin a tutna khempeuh zong a nin hi ding hi.
Hih nate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi dinga, a puante sawpin, a mahmah tui sungah kisil dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin tua nu a nin a bei zawh ni sagih khit ciangin a siang hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in tua nu in vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhuno nih la-in, kikhopna bukkong, siampipa kiangah tuate paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nadingin khat pia-in, meihal biak nadingin adang khat pia ding hi. Siampipa in ama nitna hanginTopa’mai-ah ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi.Topa’
“Amau’ laizang a om ka biakbuk ninsakkha le-uh amaute in sihlawh ding uh ahih ciangin, tua bangin note in Israel mite amau’ nitna panin siangsakin na kem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih pen a natui a pai khia mipa ahih kei leh a natui tehin, tua tawh mi nin a suak pa adingin ngeina hi a,
nin a nei nu ading zong ahi hi. Hihte pen pasal a natui a pai khia mi, ninnei numei le, a nin neih sungin numei tawh a lumkhawm mipa adingin ngeina ahi hi.
Aaron’ tapa nihte in ngeina lopi-inTopa’mai-ah mei tawh va pai-in a sihlawh khit uh cianginTopain Moses kiangah thu a gen hi.Topa’Topa

Topain Moses kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang tunga om hehpihna tokhom mai, dalna puan sunglam a siangtho munah a hun lopi-in hong pai nawn loh nadingin na sanggampa Aaron kiangah gen in. A hun lopi-in hong pai leh amah si ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua mun pen hehpihna tokhom tunga meii sungah kei ka kilatna mun ahi hi.Topa
Ahih hangin siangtho munah Aaron hong pai dingzia in: Khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtalno khat le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat hong paipih ding hi.

“Amah in a siangtho saihadial puantungsilh silhin, saihadial pheituam teengin, saihadial kawnggak tawh kigakin, saihadial dialpi khim ding hi. Hihte pen a siangtho puan ahi hi. Amah in tui sungah a pumpi sil dinga, tua ciangin tua puante silh ding hi.
“Amah in Israel mihonte tung panin khialhna hanga biak nadingin keeltal nih le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat la ding hi.
Aaron in a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in keeltal nih la-in,Topa’mai kikhopna bukkongah tuate koih ding hi.Topa’
Aaron in tua keel nihte tungah ai saanin, khat penTopaading, adang khat pen Azazel ading ahi hi.Topa
Aaron inTopaading ai a pha keel paipihin, khialhna hanga biakna-in pia ding hi.Topa
Ahih hangin Azazel adingin ai a pha keel pen gamlakah Azazel’ kiangah a kipuak theih nadingin kilemna bawl nadingin a hinginTopa’mai-ah kipaipih ding hi.Topa’
“Aaron in a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl dinga, a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal go ding hi.
Amah inTopa’biakna tau panin mei-am a dim paknamtui beel khat le a kisunen paknamtui khut nih dim la ding hi. Amah in dalna puan sungah paipihinTopa’
thuciamna singkuang tungah a om hehpihna tokhom pen paknamtui khu in a tuam theih nadinginTopa’mai-ah a om mei tungah a paknamtui koih ding hi. Tua hi kei leh amah si ding hi.Topa’
Amah in bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, a khutme tawh hehpihna tokhom a mailam tungah thehin, hehpihna tokhom mai-ah a khutme tawh a si sagihvei theh ding hi.

“Tua ciangin amah in mite ading ahi khialhna hanga biakna keel go-in, dalna puan sungah a si paipih dinga, bawngtal si a theh mah bangin a si thehin, hehpihna tokhom tung le hehpihna tokhom mai-ah theh ding hi.

Amah in tua bangin Israel mite’ nitna hang, amau’ thu palsatna hang le amau’ khialhna khempeuh hangin siangtho mun adingin kilemna bawl ding hi. Amah in amau’ nitna sungah amau tawh a omkhawm kikhopna buk adingin tua mah bangin a bawl ding hi.
Siangtho munah kilemna bawl dingin amah tumin ama ading, a innkuanpihte ading le Israel mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl khit hong pai khiat matengin kikhopna buk sungah kuamah om lo ding hi.
Tua cianginTopa’mai-ah a om biakna tau-ah amah va pai-in, biakna tau siansuahna bawl dinga, bawngtal si le keel si tawmkhat la-in, biakna tau kimkota a kite nuh ding hi.Topa’
Amah in a khutme tawh a si tawmkhat biakna tau tungah sagihvei thehin, siangsakin, Israel mite’ nitsakna panin biakna tau siangthosak ding hi.
“Amah in siangtho mun, kikhopna buk le biakna tau siansuahna a bawl khit ciangin, keel hing pen paipih ding hi.

Aaron in keel hing lu tungah a khut tegel nga-in, Israel mite’ mawhna, amau’ thu palsatna le amau’ khialhnate khempeuh, keel tungah pulak ding hi. Amah in keel lu tungah tuate suanin, a pai khiatpih dingin a kithawisa mipa tawh sehnel gamah sawl khia ding hi.
Keel in amau’ mawhnate khempeuh pua-in gam daihna-ah a pai dingin a keel khah ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna bukah Aaron hong pai-in, siangtho munah a tum hunin a silh saihadial puante suahin, tua lai-ah a puante nusia ding hi.
Amah in a siangtho mun khatah, a pumpi tui sungah silin, a puante silh dinga, hong pai khia-in, ama meihal biakna le mite’ meihal biakna pia-in, ama ading le mite adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Amah in biakna tau tungah khialhna hanga biakna sathau hal ding hi.
Azazel’ kiangah keel a paisak pa in a puante sawpin, a pumpi tui sungah sil dinga, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.
Siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin hong kipaipih si a kilakna, khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal le keel pen giahphual pualamah kipuakhia dinga, a vun, a sa le a ekte, mei tawh kihal ding hi.
Tuate a hal pa in ama puante sawpin, tui sungah a pumpi sil dinga, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.
“Hih pen, a kha sagihna, a ni sawm ni-in note adingin a tawntungin thukham hi dinga, tualsung mi hitaleh note lakah a hong peem khualmi hitaleh an tangin, na na sem kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni-in note siansak nadingin note-a’ ding kilemna kibawl dinga, na khialhna khempeuh panunTopa’mai-ah na siang ding uh hi.Topa’
Tua pen note adingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath hi a, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua pen a tawntung a thukham ahi hi.
A pa’ tanga siampi dingin sathau a kinilh a ki-ap siampipa in kilemna bawlin, a siangtho saihadial puante silh ding hi.
Amah in biakbuk siansuahna bawlin, kikhopna buk le biakna tau siansuah dinga, siampite le mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl ding hi.

Hih pen Israel mite adingin amau’ khialhnate khempeuh hangin kum khatin khatvei kilemna a kibawlsak theih nadingin note adingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.Topain amah a thupiak bangin Moses a gamta hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Aaron, ama tapate le Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih bangin gen in. Hih penTopa’thupiaksa thu ahi hi.Topa’
Israel mi khatpeuh in bawngtal ahi a, tuuno ahi a, keel ahi zongin giahphual sung ahi a, giahphual pua-ah ahi zongin go a,

Topa’biakbuk mai,Topa’tungah letsongin piak dingin kikhopna bukkongah a gawh kei leh, tua mipa thu palsat hi ding hi. Amah in sisan luangsak ahih manin ama mite’ lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’Topa’

Hih pen, gamlakah Israel mite in a gawh uh amau’ biakpiaknate hong paipih theih nading, kikhopna buk kongkhak-a siampipa’ kiang,Topa’tungah amaute in tuate hong paipih theih nading le thunuama biakpiakna-inTopatungah sa hong gawh theih nading uh deihna ahi hi.Topa’Topa
Siampipa in kikhopna buk kong-aTopa’biakna tau tungah a si thehin,Topa’tungah a gim namtui dingin a thau hal ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keeldawite adingin amau’ biakpiaknate go nawn lo ding uh hi. Hih pen amau’ khang tawntungin amaute’ tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
“Nangmah in amaute tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: Israel mite sung pan hitaleh, amaute lakah a peem khualmite sung panin hitaleh meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ahi zongin a pia mipa in
Topa’tungah piak dingin kikhopna bukkongah a paipih kei leh, ama mipihte kiang panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’
“Israel mite sung pan hitaleh amau’ lakah a peem khualmite sung pan hitaleh mi khat in si khat peuhpeuh a nek leh, si a ne mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin amah ka khen khia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi nuntakna pen si sungah om hi. Note ading kilemna bawl nadingin note adingin biakna tau tungah tua si ka piazo hi. Si pen nuntakna ahih manin kilemna a piangsak na ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in Israel mite tungah hih bangin ka ci khin hi: Note lakah kuamah in si ne lo dinga, note lakah a hong peem khualmi khatpeuh in zong si ne lo ding hi.

“Israel mite khatpeuh hitaleh, amaute lakah a peem khualmi khatpeuh in zong hitaleh, sabetna-ah, a kine thei ding gamsa khatpeuh hitaleh vasa hitaleh a man pa in a si bua khia-in leivui tawh vuk ding hi.

Ganhing khempeuh’ nuntakna pen a si ahih manin Israel mite tungah hih bangin ka ci khinzo hi: Ganhing khat peuhpeuh si na ne kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ganhing khempeuh’ nuntakna pen a si ahi hi. Si a ne mi peuhmah a mipihte kiang panin kihawl khia ding hi.

“A mawk sih hitaleh gamsate in a bal gawp hitaleh a ne mi peuhmah, tualsung mi hitaleh peemta hitaleh tua mi in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga, tua khit ciangin amah siang ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tuate sawp loin ahi zongin, kisil loin ahi zongin a om leh, amah in ama mawhna pua ding hi,” a ci hi.
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Kei pen

Note na tenna uh Egypt gamah amaute a gamtat bangin note na gamta kei ding uh a, note kong paipihna Kanaan gamah zong amaute a gamtat bangin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Note in amau’ gamtatnate na zui kei ding uh hi.
Note in keima biakna ngeina kipte semin ka thukhamte lenin tuate na zui ding uh hi. Kei pen
Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukhamte le ka biakna ngeina kipte na zui ding uh hi. Tuate a zui mi peuhpeuh nungta ding hi. Kei pen
“Note kuamah in na kinaipih na behte uh mawhpih dingin na naih kei ding uh hi. Kei pen
Na nu mawhpihna tawh na pa’ tungah maizumna na tun kei ding hi. Amah pen na nu ahih manin na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na pa’ zi dangte zong na mawhpih kei ding hi. Tua pen na pa’ mindai nading ahi hi.
Nangmah in na sanggamnu, na pa’ tanu, ahih kei leh na nu’ tanu, inn-a suak hitaleh gam a suak hitaleh na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na tapa’ tanu ahih kei leh na tanu’ tanu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ mindaina pen nangma mindaina mah ahi hi.
Na pa’ zi’ tanu, na pa’ tanu pen na sanggamnu ahih manin na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Na ni na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu pen na pa’ sanggam numei ahi hi.
Na nu’ sanggamnu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen na nu tawh a kinai beh numei ahi hi.
Na pa’ sanggampa’ tungah mindaina na tun kei ding hi; tua pen ama zi na naih kei ding hi, cihnopna ahi hi; tua nu pen nangma innlak nu ahi hi.
Na monu na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu pen na tapa’ zi ahi hi; amah na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Na sanggampa’ zi na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua pen na sanggampa’ mindai nading ahi hi.

Na luppih numei khat’ tanu na mawhpih kei dinga, tua numei’ tapa’ tanu hitaleh tua numei’ tanu’ tanu hitaleh, luppih dingin na la kei ding hi. Amaute pen nangmah tawh a kinai beh numeite ahi uh hi. Tua bang gamtatna pen a siahuai ahi hi.
Nangmah in a sanggamnu a hingsuan dingin numei khat zi-in na la kei dinga, a sanggamnu a hing laipi-in amah na luppih kei ding hi.
“Nangmah in numei khat nin a neih laitak, a nit hun sungin luppih dingin na naih kei ding hi.
Na veengpa’ zi tawh na lumkhawm kei dinga, tua nu tawh na kininsak kei ding hi.
Nangmah in Molek tungah meihal biakna-a piak dingin na tate khat peuhpeuh na pia kei dinga, tua bangin na Pasian’ min na daisak kei ding hi; keimah pen
Numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal khat tawh na lumkhawm kei ding hi; tua pen a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ganhing khatpeuh tawh mawhin tua tawh na kininsak kei dinga, numei khatpeuh in zong ganhing khatpeuh tawh a mawh dingin kipia lo ding hi; tua pen ngeina hi lo hi.
“Hih nate khatpeuh tawh note kininsak kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh note’ mai-a ka paihkhiat minamte in hihte khempeuh tawh amaute kininsak uh hi.
Leitung a nin suak ahih manin keimah in a leitang gimna pia-in, leitang in ama tunga a teeng mite a lua khia hi.
Ahih hangin, tualsung mi hitaleh note lakah hong peem khualmi hitaleh, note in keima thukhamte le keima biakna ngeina kipte na zui ding uh a, hih a kihhuai nate khat beek na hih kei ding uh hi;
(bang hang hiam cih leh note’ ma-a a om gam mite in hih a kihhuaite khempeuh gamta uh ahih manin leitang a nin a suak hi;)
tua bang hikeileh leitang in note’ ma-a a om minamte a luakkhiat bangin note in amah na nitsak uh ciangin amah in note hong lua khia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih a kihhuaite khatpeuh a hihte peuhmah, amau’ mite lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note’ ma-a a kizang hih a kihhuai ngeinate khat peuhpeuh na gamtat ngei loh nading uh le tuate tawh nomau na kinitsak loh nadingun kong thuhilhte zui un; kei pen
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mihonte khempeuh kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih lehTopanote’ Pasian keimah ka siangtho hi.Topa
Note a kuamah peuh in na nu le na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uh hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Milimte lamah kihei kei unla, note in a kisungtawm pasian-te nomau adingin bawl kei un; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Note inTopa’tungah thunuama biakpiakna na piak uh ciangin, note hong kisan theih nadingin na pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Tua pen na piak ni mah uh ahih kei leh a zing ciangin kine dinga, a ni thum ni ciang dongin a omlai peuhmah mei tawh kihal ding hi.
A ni thum ni-in a kinek peuhmah leh, tua pen a kihhuai hi a, kisang lo ding hi.
Tua a ne mi peuhmah in ama mawhna pua ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah inTopa’na a siangtho ninsak ahih manin ama mite sung panin kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’
“Na leitang tung panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lo uhah a nawl dongin an na la kei ding uh a, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sang zong na khawm kei ding uh hi.

Note in na leenggui lo uh hawkmai loin, leenggah a kiate zong na leenggui lo panun na tawm kei ding uh hi. Note in mizawngte le peemtate adingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Note na guta kei ding uh hi. A man loin na gamta kei ding uh a, khatlekhat tungah zuau na kigen kei ding uh hi.
Note in a man lopi-in keima min tawh na kiciam kei ding uh a, tua bangin na Pasian uh’ min na daisak kei ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Note in na veengte uh na nengniam kei ding uh a, a na na sut kei ding uh hi. A kicial nasem pa’ thaman pen a zingsang dong zan tawntung na kemcip kei ding uh hi.
Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte’ mai-ah a puk theih nading na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte lang gen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na veengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.
Note in na mipihte lak uhah mi gensia-in vaksuk vakto loin, na veengpa uh a sih nadingin na langpang kei ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa

“Note in na lungsim sung uhah na sanggampa uh na mudah kei ding uh a, na veengte uh tawh thu na kituah lohna uh kikum khawmin na siangsak ding uh hi; tua hikeileh ama hangin khialhna na pua ding uh hi.
Note in nomau’ mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na veengte uh na it ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa

“Note in ka thukhamte na zui ding uh hi. Note in na ganhingte uh a namdang tawh ta na neisak kei ding uh hi. Note in na lo uhah khaici nam nih na pawikhawm kei ding uh a, khau nam nih a kigan puan zong na silh kei ding uh hi.

“Sila ahi numei, midang khat in zuthawl a piaksa, kitankhia nai loin amah suahtakna a kipia nai lo nu, pasal dang khat in a lupkhoppih leh, thukanna kinei ding hi. Amaute kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu sila hi lai hi.
Ahih hangin tua pa in a mahmah adingin mawhna hanga biak nadingin tuutal khat, kikhopna bukkong,Topa’kiangah hong paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in, tua pa a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawhTopa’mai-ah ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, a gamtatnasa a khialhna kimaisak ding hi.Topa’
“Note, Kanaan gamah tungin nek dingin kung nam khempeuh na suan uh ciangin, note in amau’ gahte kum thum sung na ne kei ding uh hi.
A kum lina ciangin amau’ gah khempeuh siangtho-in,Topa’tungah phatna biakna hi ding hi.Topa’
Ahih hangin a kum ngana ciangin tuate pen note adingin hong gah semsem nadingin tuate’ gah na ne thei ding uh hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Note in sa khat peuhpeuh a sunga si tawh na nekhawm kei ding uh hi. Mailam thugen kholhna, ahih kei leh aisan na sem kei ding uh hi.
Note in na baa samte uh met loin na khamul mongte uh zong na tan kei ding uh hi.
Note in mi site’ hangin dahna limin na ci tung uh liamsak loin note’ tungah ciaptehna khat peuhpeuh zong na sun kei ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Na tanu uh biakinn sungah paktat dinga piakna tawh siasak kei un. Tua bang hileh pasian dangte biakna sungah na tung ding uh a, gam sung khempeuh, mawhna tawh a kidim suak kha ding hi.
Note in ka Sabbath ni tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Vankahte le aisanna lamah kihei kei un. Amaute tawh a kininsak dingin amaute zong kei un; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Note, sam kangte’ mai-ah na kun ding uh a, puteekte’ maitang zahtakin, na Pasian uh na kihta ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.

Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Note in thukhenna, a sau tehna, a tam tehnate-ah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.
Note in tawi khaina man, tawisuang man, seu man, bung man, na zang ding uh hi. Kei pen Egypt gam panin a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
Note in ka thukhamte khempeuh le ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
