“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite khat peuhpeuh hitaleh Israel sunga a peem khualmite hitaleh, a tate khat peuhpeuh Molek pasian tungah a pia mipa kithat dinga, mihonte in suang tawh denglum ding uh hi.
Kei mahmah in tua mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin ka hawl khia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a tate Molek tungah pia-in, ka biakbuk ninsakin, ka min siangtho daisak hi.
Amah in Molek tungah a tate khat a piak ciangin mihonte in tua pa kimuhmawh bawlin amah a thah kei uhleh,
keimah in tua mipa le ama innkuanpihte maisiatin, amah le Molek biakna-ah amah a zuite khempeuh amau’ mite lak panin ka hawl khia ding hi.
“Mi khat vankahna le aisan lamah kihei-in tuate thu a dot leh, keimah in tua mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin amah ka hawl khia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; bang hang hiam cih leh kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
Ka thukhamte zui unla, tuate sem un; note a hong siangthosakTopapen keimah ka hi hi.Topa
“Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna a mahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.
“Pasal khatpeuh a veengpa’ zi tawh a mawh leh, tua a khial pa le a khialnu kithat khawm ding hi.
A pa’ zi tawh a lumkhawm mipa in a pa a mindaisak a suak hi. Amau tegel kithat ding hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat a monu tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kithat ding hi; amaute in si kinailua mi tawh khialhna a bawl uh ahi hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat in numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal dang khat tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kihhuaina a gamta khin uh ahih manin amaute kithat dinga, amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a zi’ nu tawh zong a lakthuah leh, tua pen a kilawm lo ahi hi. Note lakah tua bang kilawm lohna a om loh nadingin tua pa le a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi.
Pasal khatpeuh ganhing khat tawh a mawh leh amah le a ganhing kithat ding hi.
Numei khat in ganhing khat naihin tua tawh a mawh leh, note in a numei le a ganhing na that ding uh hi; amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.

“Pasal khat in ama sanggamnu, ahih kei leh a nu’ tanu tenpihin a lupkhawm uhleh, tua pen a zumhuai hi a, amau’ mipihte’ omna panin amaute kihawl khia ding hi. Ama sanggamnu tawh mawh ahih manin tua pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
Pasal khat, nin a nei numei khat tawh lumkhawmin a mawh uhleh, amau tegel in siantho nading ngeina palsat uh ahih manin amau’ mipihte lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
“Note pen na nu’ sanggamnu ahih kei leh na pa’ sanggamnu tawh na mawh kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a nai behte tawh mawhna ahih manin amaute in amau’ mawhna pua ding uh hi.
Pasal khat, a pa’ sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in a pa’ sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in amau’ khialhna thuak ding uh a, ta nei loin si ding uh hi.
Pasal khat in a sanggampa’ zi a lak leh, tua pen nitna hi a, amah in a sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in ta nei lo ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukham khempeuh le ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in, tuate na sem ding uh hi. Tua pen note na ten nadingun kong paipih nading leitang in note hong luakkhiat loh nading ahi hi.
Note’ mai-ah keimah in ka paihkhiat minamte’ ngeinate na zui kei ding uh hi. Amaute in hih nate khempeuh hih uh ahih manin amaute ka kih hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in note kiangah, ‘Note in amau’ leitang na luah ding uh hi. Bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitang, na neih dingun note tungah kong pia ding hi,’ kong ci khinzo hi. Kei pen mite’ kiang panin note a hong khen khiaTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin note in ganhing a siang le a nin, vasa a siang le a nin khentelna na bawl ding uh hi. Note in nin hi, ci-in na seh dingun keimah in ka tuam koihsa ganhing hitaleh vasa hitaleh leitunga a pai thei khat peuhpeuh tawh hitaleh, note na kininsak kei ding uh hi.
Note pen keima adingin na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih lehTopaahi keimah ka siangtho a, note pen keima-a’ na hih theih nadingun mite kiang panin note kong tuamkoih zo hi.Topa
“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin van a kah a, ai a saan leh kithat dinga, suang tawh amaute kidenglum ding hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Aaron’ tapa siampite tungah thu gen inla, amaute lak panin kuamah in ama beh nai pen ahi a nu, a pa, a tapa, a tanu, a sanggampa,Topa

ahih kei leh nungak ahi a sanggamnu (tua nu in pasal nei nai lo ahih manin amah tawh a kinai ahi hi; tua nu hangin amah kininsak thei ding hi) longal ama mite lakah misite’ hangin kininsak lo ding hi.
Amah in pasal neisa numei khatpeuh hangin ama mite lakah va kininsakin, tua bangin kidaisak lo ding hi.
“Amaute in a lu uh mettol loin, amau’ khamul nawlhui zong kiat loin, a ci tung uh liamsak lo ding uh hi.

Amaute pen amau’ Pasian adingin siangtho ding uh a, amau’ Pasian’ min daisak lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ Pasian’ anlum ahi,Topa’tungah meihal biakna pia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute siangtho ding uh hi.Topa’
Amaute in numei paktat ahih kei leh a kininsaksa numei teenpih lo ding uh a, a pasal in a maksa numei zong teenpih lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa pen ama Pasian adingin siangtho hi.
Amah in note’ Pasian’ anlum pia ahih manin note in amah na ap ding uh a, amah pen note adingin siangtho ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopaahi keimah, note hong siangthosakpa, ka siangtho hi.Topa
Siampipa khat peuhpeuh’ tanu in paktatna tawh amah le amah a kidaisak leh, ama pa a daisak ahi hi. Tua nu mei tawh kihallum ding hi.
“Ama sanggamte lakah siampi lianpen, a lu tungah nilh sathau a kisunna pa, a puante silh dingin a ki-ap khin siampipa in a samte phiahsak loin, a puante zong balkek lo ding hi.
Amah in a nu le a pa nangawn ahi zongin misi khat peuhpeuh kiangah pai loin, a mahmah zong kininsak lo ding hi.
Biakbuk panin zong pai khia loin, ama Pasian’ biakbuk zong daisak lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama Pasian-a’ ahi ki-apna nilh sathau ama tungah om hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
Amah in a zi dingin nungak la ding hi.
Meigong numei, a kimasa numei, a kininsaksa numei, numei paktat, hih bangte pawl teenpih lo dinga, amah in ama mite lak panin nungak khat zi-in la ding hi.
Tua pen ama mite lakah a tate a daisak loh nading ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a siangthosakpa pen keimahTopaka hi hi, ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses tungah,Topa
“Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen in: Na suanlekhakte sung panin poina a nei mi in a khang khangin ama Pasian’ anlum pia dingin hong neh thei lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh poina a nei, mittaw, khelbai, maihem le khutlekhe saulua,
khut liam, khe liam,
elkul le mi cingtaak lo, mit hoih lo le cithak a vei, meima nei le ciltang kitam mi in hong naih lo ding hi.

Siampi Aaron’ suanlekhakte sung panin poina a nei mi khatpeuh inTopaading meihal biakna a pia dingin a nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi. Amah in poina nei ahih manin, ama Pasian’ anlum pia dingin a nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi.Topa
Amah in ama Pasian’ anlum, a siangtho pen le a siangtho ante ne thei ding hi.

Ahih hangin amah in poina nei ahih manin, ka biakbuk a daisak loh nadingin dalna puan gei ahi a, biakna tau nai-ah ahi zongin hong pai lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a siangthosakpa pen keimahTopaka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Aaron le a tapate le Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Aaron le a tapate in keima min siangtho a daisak loh nadingun amaute in keima tungah a hong ap uh ahi, Israel mite’ piak a siangthote panin a kikep nadingun gen in; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa

Amaute kiangah, ‘Na suanlekhakte uh sung panin a khangkhangin khatpeuh in a nit laitakin Israel mite inTopa’tungah a ap a siangtho nate a naih leh keima omna panin tua pa kihawl khia ding hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa’Topa

“‘Aaron’ gui sung panin meima nei le a natui a pai khia mi peuhmah in amah a siangtho mateng a siangtho an ne thei lo ding hi. Misi lawnna hitaleh a natui a teh pa lawnna hitaleh a nin na khat peuhpeuh a lawng pa,
amah a nit theih nadingin a bokvak ganhing khat hitaleh nitna a ngah theih nading mi khat hitaleh a lawng pa, ama nitna pen bangbang hitaleh,
tua bang na a lawng mipa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga, amah in tui sungah a pumpi a sil kei leh a siangtho an ne lo ding hi.
Ni a tum ciangin amah siang dinga, tua khit ciangin amah in a siangtho an ne thei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bangte pen ama nek ding mah ahi hi.
A mawk sihte hitaleh gamsate in a bal gawpte hitaleh amah in tuate nekna tawh amah kininsak lo ding hi; kei penTopaka hi hi, ci hi,’ ci in.Topa
“Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ka thuhilhna zui ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh amaute in tua thu a daisak uh ciangin khialhna thuakin sihpih ding uh hi. Amaute a siangthosakpa pen keimahTopaka hi hi.Topa
“A pualam mi in a siangtho an ne lo ding hi. Siampipa’ inn-ah a om peemta ahi a, a kicial nasemte in ahi zongin a siangtho an ne lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa khat in ama adingin sum tawh sila khat a lei leh, tua a sila in ne thei ding hi. Ama inn sungah a suak mite in ama an ne thei ding uh hi.
Siampipa’ tanu khat a pualam mi khat tawh a kiteen leh tua nu in a siangtho biakna an ne thei lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin siampipa’ tanu pen meigong ahi a, a kima ahi zongin, ta nei loin a nungak lai mah bangin a pa’ inn-ah a ciahkik leh, tua nu in a pa’ an ne thei ding hi. Ahi zongin a pualam mi kuamah in tua an ne thei lo ding hi.
“Mi khat in theih lohna hangin a siangtho an khat peuhpeuh a nekkhak leh, tua a na manzah seh nga-ah seh khat behlapin, siampipa tungah a siangtho an man pia ding hi.
Amaute inTopa’tungah a piak ahi, Israel-te’ an a siangtho pen siampite in ninsak lo ding uh a,Topa’
tua bangin amau’ an a siangthote nekna tawh mawhna le khialhna amaute puasak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen amaute a siangthosakTopaka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Aaron le a tapate le Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite sung panin ahi zongin Israel mite sungah a peem mite lak pan ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in biakna a piak ciangin, thuciamna a tunsakna hitaleh meihal biakna-inTopa’tungah a kipia utthu-a biakna hitaleh,Topa’
hong kisan theih nadingin bawngtal hitaleh tuu hitaleh keel hitaleh, a sitbaang lo a pa khat na pia ding uh hi.
Note in a sitbaang khat peuhpeuh na pia kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hong kisang zo lo ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh in bawnghon panin ahi a, tuulekeel hon panin ahi zongin thuciamna tunsak nading hitaleh utthu-a biakna-in hitalehTopa’tungah thunuama biakna a piak ciangin, a kisan theih nadingin a ganhing a cidam hi dinga, sitbaanna a om lo hi ding hi.Topa’

Ganhing a mittaw, a gamtang thei lo, a hem, meima nai a nei, cithak ahih kei leh meima a neite pen, note inTopa’tungah pia loin,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in biakna tau tungah tuate na zang kei ding uh hi.Topa’Topa’

Bawngtal hitaleh tuuno hitaleh a na khat peuhpeuh a saulua ahih kei leh a tomluate pen note in utthu-a biakna-in na pia thei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin thuciamna tunsakna a piak dingin tua bangte kisang zo lo hi.
A ciltangte a sanim, a kisuzan, a kitam, ahih kei leh a ki-atkhia ganhing khat peuhpeuh, note inTopa’tungah pia loin, na gam sung uhah biakna-in na zang kei ding uh hi.Topa’
“Gamdang mite khat peuhpeuh tung panin a kingah ganhingte zong na Pasian uh’ an dingin note in na pia kei ding uh hi. Amaute sitbaang a, hem ahih manin tuate hong kisang zo lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Bawng ahih kei leh tuu ahih kei leh keel khat a suah ciangin a pi tawh ni sagih sung omkhawm ding hi. A ni giat ni a kipanin tua ganno penTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in kisang thei ding hi.Topa’
A pi pen bawng hitaleh tuu hitaleh, note in a pi le a no ni khat sungin na gokhawm kei ding uh hi.
Note inTopa’tungah lungdam koh biakna na piak uh ciangin, note hong kisan theih nadingin na pia ding uh hi.Topa’
A tua ni mahin kine dinga, note in zingsang dong siit na nei kei ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiaknate zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
Note in keima min siangtho na daisak kei ding uh a, Israel mite lakah kei hong kisiangthosak ding hi. Kei pen note a hong siangthosakTopa,Topa,
note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa ka hi hi; kei penTopaka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in a siangtho biak kikhopnate hi, ci-in na gen ding uh keimahTopa’pawi a kisehte hih bang ahi hi.Topa’

Ni guk sungin nasep kizo dinga, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna ahi hi. Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note’ tenna khempeuh ahTopaadingin Sabbath ahi hi.Topa
“Hihte pen amaute adingin a kiseh hunin note in na gen ding uh ahiTopa’pawi a kisehte, a siangtho biak kikhopnate ahi hi.Topa’
“A kha masa, a ni sawm le li nitak penTopa’Paisan Pawi ahi hi.Topa’
Tua kha mah, a ni sawm le nga ni penTopa’tungah silngo sawh loh anlum pawi ahi hi. Ni sagih sung note in silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi.Topa’
A ni masa ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note inTopa’tungah meihal biakna ni sagih sung na pia ding uh hi. A ni sagih ni pen a siangtho kikhopna ni hi dinga, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note tungah ka hong piak leitangah note tungin an na lak uh ciangin, note in an na lakna uhah anpal lom khat, siampipa kiangah na paipih ding uh hi.
Note hong kisan theih nadingin amah inTopa’mai-ah anlom vei dinga, Sabbath ni a zing ciangin siampipa in tua anlom vei ding hi.Topa’
Note in anlom na vei ni-un,Topa’tungah meihal biakna-in a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat na pia ding uh hi.Topa’

Tua tawh a kipia khawm ding an tawh biakna pen sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh nih hi dinga, a gim namtui dinginTopa’tungah meihal biakna-in kipia ding hi. Tua tawh a kipia khawm ding leenggahzu tawh biakna pen leenggahzu thawl khat hi ding hi.Topa’

Note in na Pasian uh biakna na paipih ma, hih ni matengin anlum hitaleh a ki-em an hitaleh a sial hitaleh na ne kei ding uh hi; tua pen note’ khang tawntungin na tenna khempeuh uhah ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.
“Note in Sabbath khit a zing ciang, vei-a biakna anlom na paipih ni uh a kipan nipikal sagih bit dong a ni na simto ding uh hi.
A Sabbath sagihna khit a zing ciang dong ni sawmnga dong na simto ding uh a, tua ciangin note inTopa’tungah an thak tawh biakna na paipih ding uh hi.Topa’
Note in na tenna uh panin vei dingin an lawh nih a kibawl anlum nih nong paipih ding uh hi. Tuate pen annel a kibawl, silngo sawhin a ki-em,Topa’tungah anpalin a kipia hi ding hi.Topa’

Note in anlum tawh, a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno sagih le bawngtalno khat le tuutal nih na pia ding uh hi. Tuate,Topa’tungah a gim namtui mei tawh kihal biak nadingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate tawhTopa’tungah meihal biakna hi ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Note in khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat le thunuama biakpiakna-in kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nih na pia ding uh hi.
Siampipa inTopa’mai-ah vei-a biakna-in anpal-anlum le tuuno nih tawh tuate vei dinga, tuate pen siampipa adinginTopa’mai-ah a siangtho hi ding hi.Topa’Topa’

Note in tua ni mahin thu zaksakna na bawl ding uh a, a siangtho kikhop khat na nei ding uh hi. Note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi; tua pen note’ tenna khempeuh ah na khang tawntungun ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.

“Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte le khualmi adingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: A kha sagihna, a ni masa ni-in note in a thupi tawlngakna ni khat, peengkul aw tawh a kitaangko phawksakna, a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi.
Note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh a,Topa’tungah meihal biakna na paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Hih a kha sagihna ni sawm ni pen kilemna ni ahi hi. Tua pen note adingin a siangtho kikhop hun hi dinga, note in an tangin,Topa’tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua penTopanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin kilemna bawl ni ahi hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni-in bang khat peuhpeuh a nekha mi peuhmah ama mite kiang panin kihawl khia ding hi.
Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah keimah in ama mite lak panin ka that ding hi.
Note in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen na khang tawntungun na tenna khempeuh uhah ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.
Tua pen note adingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi dinga, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua kha ni kua nitak a kipan, a nitak panin a nitakkik dong note in na Sabbath uh na tang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm le nga ni a kipan ni sagih sung penTopaading buk pawi ahi hi.Topa
A ni masa ni pen a siangtho kikhopna ni hi dinga, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.

Ni sagih sung note inTopa’tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh a, a ni giat ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in,Topa’tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tua pen a thupi kikhopna khat hi a, note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.Topa’Topa’

“Hihte penTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate, biakpiakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate, amau’ ni ciatin piak dingin a siangtho kikhopna hunin na gen ding uh,Topa’pawi a kisehte ahi hi.Topa’Topa’
Note inTopa’tungah na piak uhTopa’Sabbath-te, note’ letsongte, thuciamna hangin na biaknate khempeuh uh le utthu-a na biaknate khempeuh uh banah piak ding ahi hi.Topa’Topa’

“Note in leitang a piangte na kaihkhop khit uh, kha sagihna, a ni sawm le nga ni a kipan ni sagih sungTopa’pawi na bawl ding uh hi. A ni masa ni pen a thupi tawlngakna khat hi a, a ni giat ni zong a thupi tawlngakna khat mah hi ding hi.Topa’
Note in a ni masa ni-in singkung hoih gahte, nisuh hiangte, a teh tam singhiangpite le lui a gialhekte la-in,Topana Pasian uh pahtawina, ni sagih sung pawi na bawl ding uh hi.Topa
Note in tua pen kum simin ni sagih sung pawi-in na nei ding uh a, note’ khang tawntungin ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi. Note in kha sagihna sungah na bawl ding uh hi.
No Israel mi khempeuh ni sagih sung buk sungah na teeng ding uh hi.
Tua pen keimah in Egypt gam panin amaute ka pai khiatpih lai-in Israel mite, buk sungah ka tensakna thu note’ suanlekhakte in a theih nading uh ahi hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tu-a bangin Moses in Israel mite tungahTopa’pawi a kisehte a gen hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Meivak khat a tawntungin a kivaksuak theih nadingin meivak adingin oliv gah a kisuzante panin sathau siangtho nang kiangah hong paipih nading uh Israel mite thu pia in.

Kikhopna buk sung, thuciamna singkuang dalna puan pualamah, Aaron in nitak a kipanin zingsang donginTopa’mai-ah a tawntungin tua meivak a ngeina bangin koih dinga, tua pen na khang tawntungun ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.Topa’
Amah in kham citak meivakkhuam tungah meivakte a ngeina banginTopa’mai-ah omsak tawntung ding hi.Topa’
“Nangmah in annel la inla, tua panin moh sawm le nih bawlin em in; moh khat ciangin annel lawh nih hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak sabuai tungah tuate gual nihin na koih dinga, gual khatah guk om ding hi.
Phawkna-inTopa’tungah mei tawh biakna-in piak dingin anlum tawh a paikhawm theih nadingin nangmah in a gual nihte-ah paknamtui siangtho na koih ding hi.Topa’
Sabbath ni simin Aaron in a tawntung thuciamna-in Israel mite tang dinginTopa’mai-ah a ngeina bangin koih tawntung ding hi.Topa’

Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna sung panin amah in a tawntung a a ngah ding, a siangtho pen ama kaih ahih manin, Aaron le a suante-a’ ding hi a, amaute in a siangtho mun khatah ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tu-in Israel numei khat’ tapa, a pa Egypt mi ahi khat, Israel mite lakah a pai hi. Israel numei’ tapa le Israel mi khat giahphual ah kitawng uh a,
Israel numei’ tapa in Min Siangtho gensia-in samsia hi. Amaute in Moses kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Ama nu’ min pen Shelomith hi a, Dan minam, Dibri’ tanu ahi hi.
Topa’deihna amaute tungah a kigen mateng amaute in tua mipa khumcip uh hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“A samsia mipa pen giahphual pualamah paipih in. Ama samsiat a za mi khempeuh ama lu tungah amau’ khut ngasak inla, mihonte khempeuh amah denglumsak in.
Tua ciangin Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Ama Pasian a samsia mi peuhmah in ama khialhna thuak ding hi.
Topa’min a gensia mipa kithat ding hi. Mihonte khempeuh in amah denglum ding uh hi. Peemta hitaleh tualsung mi hitaleh, Min Siangtho a gensiate kithat ding hi.Topa’
“Mi a that pa kithat ding hi.
Ganhing a that pa in a ganhing mahin loh ding hi. A thu-in ci lehang nuntakna le nuntakna a kithuk ding ahi hi.
“Mi khat in a veengte khat a poisak leh, ama hih bangin ama tung mahah kithukkik dinga,
guh kitan tang ding guh kitan, mittang tang ding mittang, ha tang ding ha kihih dinga, amah in mi khat a poisak bangin amah kipoisak ding hi.
Ganhing a that pa in loh dinga, mi a that pa kithat ding hi.
Note in peemta le tualsung mi adingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israel mite tungah hih thu a gen hi. Amaute in a samsia mipa giahphual pualamah paipih uh a, suang tawh a denglum uh hi.Topain Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite in a hih uh hi.Topa
Topain Sinai Mual tungah Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong piak leitangah na tun uh ciangin,Topapahtawina-in leitang tawlngak hun na omsak ding uh hi.Topa
Kum guk sung note in na lo uh na pawi ding uh a, kum guk sung na leenggui lo uh hahin a gahte na kaikhawm ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin a kum sagihna-ah leitang ading a thupi tawlngakna sabbath,Topapahtawina sabbath om ding hi. Note in na lo uh na pawi kei ding uh a, na leenggui lo uh na hah kei ding uh hi.Topa
A li pote note in na kaikhawm kei ding uh a, a kipuah lo leenggui gahte na khawm kei ding uh hi. Leitang adingin a thupi tawlngakna hi ding hi.
Lo na khawh loh uh hangin leitang tawlngak kumin a piang tawmte in note ading, na sila numei le na sila pasalte ading, a kicial nasemte le note tawh a teeng a peem mite ading an hong sik ding hi.
A piang khempeuhte pen na bawngte uh le na leitang uhah a om ganhingte’ an ding ahi hi.
“Kum nipi sagih hun pen note adingin kum sawmli le kua ahih theih nadingin note in kum nipi sagih, kum sagih mun sagihvei na simto ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin note in kha sagihna a ni sawm ni-in nakpi-in peengkul na tum ding uh a, kilemna ni-in note in na gam sung khempeuh uhah peengkul aw na ging khiasak ding uh hi.

Note in a kum sawmngana siangthosakin, gam sunga a teeng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uh hi. Note in nomau’ neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau’ innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note adingin jubilee hi ding hi.
Tua a kum sawmngana pen note adingin jubilee hi ding hi. Tua kum sungin note in lo pawi loin, a li pote zong la loin, a kihah lo leengguite panin zong leenggah na khawm kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen jubilee ahi hi. Tua pen note-a’ dingin siangtho dinga, note in lo panin a piang tawmte na ne ding uh hi.
“Hih jubilee kum sungin note khempeuh in nomau’ neihsa ciat na ngahkik ding uh hi.
Note in na veengte’ tungah na zuak uh ahi zongin na veengte’ kiang panin na lei uh ahi zongin note khatlekhat na kikhem kei ding uh hi.
Jubilee khit ciangin a jubilee kik dong a kum phazah tawh kituakin note in na veengte uh kiang panin lei-in, a an piang ding kum zah tawh kituakin amau in note tungah hong zuak ding uh hi.
A kum a tam lai leh a man na tamsak ding uh a, a kum a tawm leh a man na tawmsak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh no tungah hong zuak pen a tuk tung ding zah ahi hi.
Note khatlekhat kikhem loin na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukhamte le ka biakna ngeina kipte zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi. Tua hileh note lungmuang takin gam sungah na teeng ding uh hi.
Leitang in an hong piangsak dinga, note in na khamtakun ne-in, lungmuang takin na teeng ding uh hi.
“Note in, ‘Lo lah pawi loin, an lah la kei lehang, a kum sagihna-ah bang ne ding ihi hiam?’ na cih uhleh
keimah in a kum gukna-ah note tungah thupha kong pia dinga, kum thum sung khom ding an hong piang ding hi.
A kum giatna-ah lo na pawi ding uh ciangin, note in anlui na ne lai ding uh hi. Anthak hong tun a kum kuana mateng note in a lui na ne ding uh hi.
“Leitang pen keima-a’ ahih manin neihsuak dingin leitang kizuak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen kei tawh a omkhawm khualmi le peemtate na hi uh hi.
“Note in na neih uh leitang khempeuh na kitanhkiksak thei ding uh hi.
Na sanggampa zawngin a neihsa leitang khenkhat a zuak leh, amah tawh a kinai a behpa hong pai-in a sanggampa’ zuaksa tanh ding hi.
Mi khat in tua na a tatsak ding mi a neih kei a, a mahmah hong haukikin a tanh zo dingin a pian leh,
amah in tua na a zuak zawh a kumte sim dinga, a zuakna mipa tungah a piak lai ding a kisam zah pia dinga, amah in a neihsa ngahkik ding hi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama adingin ngahkik zawh nading lampi a neih kei leh, tua ama zuak leitang pen jubilee kum mateng a leipa’ khut sungah om ding hi. Jubilee kum ciangin tua leitang kipiakhia dinga, amah in a neihsa ngahkik ding hi.
“Mi khat in khuapikulh sungah tenna inn khat a zuak leh, a kizuak khit kum khat bit sungin amah in tanhkik thei dinga, kum khat bit sungin amah in tatkik theih nading thu nei ding hi.
Tua pen kum khat bit sungin a kitatkik kei leh, khuapikulh sunga om tua inn pen a leipa in khang tawntungin a neih dingin kibawlsak dinga, jubilee kum ciangin zong kipiakhiakik tuan nawn lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin a kimkotah kulh a nei lo khua neu-a innte pen gam sung lote tawh a kibangin kingaihsun ding hi. Tuate kitanhkik thei dinga, jubilee kum ciangin tuate kipiakhia ding hi.
Ahi zongin Levi mite’ khuapite, amau’ neihsa khuapite-a innte ahihleh, Levi mite in khatvei peuh ciangin tanh thei ding uh hi.

Levi mi khatpeuh in ama tatkik theih ding hinapi a tatkik zawh kei leh, amau’ neihsa khuapi sunga tua inn pen jubilee kum ciangin kipiakik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi mite’ khuapi sunga innte pen Israel mite’ lakah amau’ neihsa ahi hi.
Ahih hangin amau’ khuapi taang gamte kizuak thei lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen amau’ neih tawntung na ahi hi.
“Na sanggampa uh zawngin, note bangin amah a kivak zawh kei leh, note in amah na vak ding uh hi. Khualmi le peemta bangin amah pen note tawh hong om ding hi.
Na sanggampa uh no kiangah hong ten theih nadingin ama tung panin a meet a khang la kei unla, na Pasian uh zahtak un.
Note in ama tungah a meetin sum leitawi pia loin, ama tungah a meetin na an uh zong na pia kei ding uh hi.
Kei pen note’ Pasian ahi ding le, note tungah Kanaan leitang a hong pia dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah a mahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi.
Amah pen a kicial nasem le peemta bangin nang kiangah om ding hi. Amah in jubilee kum mateng nangma na hong sem dinga,
tua ciangin nang kiang panin amah le ama kiangah a om a tate pai khia dinga, ama innkuan zuan kikin, a pate’ neihsa ngahkik ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Egypt gam panin ka pai khiatpih keima nasemte hi a, amaute sila-in kizuak lo ding hi.
Note in hih gawpgawpna tawh amah na uk kei ding uh a, na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi.
Note in na neih theih ding uh sila numei le sila pasalte hih bang ahi hi: Na kimkot uha om minam dangte lak panin sila numei le sila pasal na lei thei ding uh hi.
Note in na gam sung uhah a suak, note lakah a hong peem khualmite le note tawh a om amau’ innkuante lak panin zong na lei thei ding uh a, amaute pen nomau a’ hi thei ding uh hi.

Note in amaute pen note’ khit ciangin na tapate uh tungah amau’ neih tawntung dingin a luah dingin na pia thei ding uh hi. Note in sila-in amaute na nei thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggam uh Israel mite khatlekhat hih gawpgawpna tawh na ki-uk kei ding uh hi.

“Note lakah a teeng khualmi ahih kei leh peemta khat hong hau a, ama kiang a om na sanggampa uh zawngin, no tawh a om khualmipa tung ahi a, peemta mipa tungah ahi zongin, tua ahih kei leh khualmipa’ innkuan khat peuhpeuh tungah amah a kizuak leh,
amah a kizuak khit ciangin amah kitanhkik thei dinga, ama sanggamte khat peuhpeuh in amah tanh thei ding hi.

Ama innlak pa ahih kei leh a innlak sanggampa in tanh thei ding hi. Ama innkuan sunga a kinaipih a beh khatpeuh in amah tanh thei ding hi. Tua ahih kei leh zong amah a hauh leh a mahmah kitanhkik thei ding hi.

Midang tungah a mahmah a kizuak a kipan jubilee kum dong amah a leipa tawh tuat dinga, ama suahtak nading sum pen a kum phazah tawh kituak hi ding hi. A topa tawh a omkhawm hun sungteng pen a kicial nasem khat thaman zahin seh ding hi.
Kum tampi in a sap lai leh, amah in tuate tawh a kituakin ama thaman ding a kipiakna sung panin ama kitatkhiat nadingin piakik ding hi.
Ahih hangin jubilee kum ding kum tawmkhat bek in a sap leh amah in a topa tawh tuatna khat nei ding hi. Ama sepsak ding kum a omlai tawh kituakin ama kitatkhiat nadingin sum piakik ding hi.
Amah pen a topa tungah a kum kumin a kicial nasem pa tawh kibang ding hi. A topa in note’ muhna-ah hih gawpgawpna tawh amah uk lo ding hi.
Hih bang danin amah a kitatkhiat kei leh, jubilee kum ciangin amah le amah tawh a om a tate kikhahkhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite pen kei adingin nasemte ahi uh hi. Amaute pen Egypt gam panin keimah in ka pai khiatpih keima nasemte ahi uh hi; kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa

“Note in nomau adingin a mai-ah na kun dingun milim bawl loin, a kiseek milim hitaleh biakna song hitaleh na dingsak kei ding uh a, na gam sung uhah suang milim na phut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
Note in ka sabbath-te tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uh hi; kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
“Note in ka thukham zui-in, ka thupiaknate mangin tuate na sep uhleh,
keimah in note tungah guahtui a hunin kong pia dinga, leitang in an hong piangsakin, lo-a kungte in amau’ gah gah ding uh hi.
Na cil uh ante leenggah lawh hun dong kimang dinga, leenggah minte zong lopawi hun dong kimang ding hi. Note in na khamtakun an na ne ding uh a, lungnuam takin na gam sung uhah na teeng ding uh hi.

“Keimah in gam sungah nopsakna hong pia-in, note lungnuam takin na lum ding uh a, bangmah in note hong lausak lo ding hi. Keimah in gam sung panin ganhing gilote ka hawl khia dinga, galkidona in na gam uh hong nawk lo ding hi.
Note in na galte uh na delh ding uh a, note’ mai-ah namsau in amaute puksak ding hi.
Note nga in zakhat zo-in, note zakhat in tul sawm na zo ding uh hi. Note’ mai-ah namsau in na galte uh puksak ding hi.
Keimah in note ka hong pi ngaihsut dinga, note hong pungsakin, tampi kong phasak dinga, note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi.
Note in sauveipi a kikhol anluite ne-in, a thak koih nadingin a lui na hahsiang masa ding uh hi.
Keimah in note lakah omna ka bawl dinga, keimah in note kong kih kei ding hi.
Keimah, note’ lakah omin note’ Pasian ka hi dinga, note, keima mite na hi ding uh hi.
Note pen amau’ sila na hih loh nadingun Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi. Keimah in note’ gimna hakkolte kuaitanin note a dingtangin kong paisak hi.Topa
“Ahih hangin note in ka thu ngai loin, hih thupiaknate khempeuh na hih kei uh a,
ka thukhamte nialin, ka biakna ngeina kipte kih a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh sem loin, ka thuciamna na palsat uhleh,

keimah in note tungah hih bangin kong hih ding hi: Note’ tungah hong tung dingin keimah in thakhatthu a dipkuatna, zawngkhalna le mite siasakin nuntakna a kiamsak ding cisa natna kong tungsak ding hi. Note’ lopawi zong a mawkna hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na galte un tuate ne ding hi.
Keimah in note kong maisiat dinga, na galte uh mai-ah lelhna na thuak ding uh hi. Note hong mudah mite in note hong uk dinga, kuamah in note hong delh lo napi-in na tai ding uh hi.
“Tua bang hinapi-in note in ka thu nong ngaih kei veve uhleh, keimah in na khialhna hangun a zah sagih vei-in note kong thuhilhkik dinga,
keimah in na kiphatsakpih uh note’ vangliatna susia-in, van panin guah hong zusak loin, na leitang uh sik ka bangsak ding hi.
Na leitang un an piangsak loin, na gam sung uha kungte in amau’ gah gah lo ding ahih manin note’ thatang a mawkna-in a bei hi ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kei hong demin, keima thu na ngaih kei lai uhleh, keimah in note’ khialhna a zah sagih vei-in note’ tungah gimna kong tungsak ding hi.
Keimah in note’ lakah gamsate hong khahin, amaute in na tate uh hong neksak ding uh a, na ganhingte uh susia-in, note mi tawmno khat hong suah dinga, note’ lampite zong gamkhing hong suak ding hi.
“Hih banga hihna tawh note hong kihei tuan loin, kei na hong demlai uhleh,
kei zong note hong gawtin, kei mahmah in na khialhnate uh hangin a zah sagih vei-in kong sat ding hi.

Keimah in, thuciamna omsa bangin phulakna na a sem ding namsau khat note’ tungah kong tungsak ding hi. Na khuapi sung uhah note na kikaihkhop uhleh zong keimah in note’ lakah natna kong tungsak dinga, na galte uh khut sungah note hong kipia ding hi.

Keimah in note’ nuntakna an ka suksiat ciangin, an kicing lo ahih manin nupi sawm in meibung khat sungah na anlum uh emkhawm dinga, na anlum uh a tawitehin hong pia khiakik ding hi. Note in na ne ding uh a, na kham zo kei ding uh hi.
“Tua bang hinapi-in note in keima thu ngai loin, kei na hong demlai uhleh,
note ka hong heh ngawh bawl dinga, note’ khialhna hangin a zah sagih vei-in kong thuhilh ding hi.
Note na gil uh kial lua ding ahih manin na tapate uh le na tanute uh’ sa na ne ding uh hi.
Keimah in mual dawna na biaknate uh susia-in, na paknamtui biakna taute uh phukin, note’ milim’ siluang hawmte tungah na luanghawmte uh ka pai dinga, keimah in note kong kih ding hi.
Keimah in na khuapite uh siasakin, na biakna munte uh gamkhing ka suaksak dinga, nomau’ hong biakna a gim namtuite ka diik kei ding hi.
Keimah in leitang ka siasak dinga, tua tungah a teeng na galte un lamdangsa ding uh hi.
Keimah in minam dangte lakah note kong thehthang dinga, keimah in namsau a paai panin dokin note kong delh ding hi. Na leitang uh gamkhing suak dinga, na khuapite uh a sia hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin na galte uh leitangah na om tanvei uh, gamkhingin a om sungteng, leitang in tawlngak hun a ngah hi ding hi. Leitang tawlnga-in, a sabbath-te a tang hi ding hi.
Ama tungah na ten laitakun na ngahsak loh uh tawlngakna ahi a sabbath-te, gamkhingin a om sungteng a tawlnga hi ding hi.

“Note’ sung panin galte’ leitangah a omlai mite tungah lungsim gimna ka tungsak ding hi. Nahthel ging in amaute taisak dinga, namsau mai-ah mi khat a tai bangin amaute tai ding uh a, kuamah in a delh lohpi-in amaute puk ding uh hi.
Kuamah in delh lo napi-in namsau mai pan a tai khia bangin khatlekhat na kiphupai ding uh a, na galte uh nan zawh nading vangliatna na nei kei ding uh hi.
Minam dangte lakah note na sia ding uh a, na galte uh’ leitang in note hong valhtum ding hi.
Note’ sung panin galte’ leitangah a omlaite amau’ mawhna hangin kiam ding uh a, amau’ pute pate a mawhna uh hangin a kiam bangun amau zong a kiam ding uh hi.

“Ahih hangin kei tungah khemna tawh hong gamtatnasa uh le kei hong demna uh hangin amaute gawt bawlin, amau’ galte’ leitangah amaute ka paipihna hangin, amau’ mawhna le a pu a pate uh mawhna pulakin a lungsim uh niamkhiatin, amaute in a mawhna a kipuahphat uhleh,
keimah in Jakob tawh ka thuciamna, Isaac tawh ka thuciamna le Abraham tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk dinga, leitang zong ka phawk ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in leitang nusia-in, amaute om loin gamkhingin a om sungteng leitang in a sabbath-te na ngah ding hi. Amaute in ka biakna ngeina kipte nialin, ka thukhamte mudah uh ahih manin, a mawhna uh a kipuahphat ding uh kisam hi.

Bangbang ahi zongin, a galte uh gam sungah amaute a om sungteng uh keimah in amaute nil khia loin, amaute a susia mai mang zah ding le amaute tawh ka thuciamna a pelhzah dingin amaute ka mudah kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei penTopaamau’ Pasian ka hi hi.Topa

Ahih hangin keimah in amaute ka ngaihsutna-in amau’ Pasian ka hih theih nadingin, minam dangte’ muhna-ah Egypt gam panin ka pai khiatpih amau’ pulepate tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi; kei penTopaka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Hihte pen Moses tungtawnin Sinai Mual tungahTopain amah le Israel mite kikalah a bawl thukhamte le biakna ngeina kipte le thute ahi hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Mi khat in a tuam vilvelin kiciamna a bawl ciangin, tua a kiciam mite pen nangmah inTopa-a’ in na seh dinga, a nuai-a kiseh bangin kitanh-in suaktakik thei ding hi.Topa
Pasal kum sawmnih panin kum sawmguk a phate a man na sehna pen, biakinn shekel zangin pasal khat ciangin ngun shekel sawmnga hi ding hi.
Numei ahihleh shekel sawmthum hi ding hi.
Kum nga pan kum sawmnih ciang a phate, pasal ahihleh shekel sawmnih hi dinga, numei ahihleh shekel sawm hi ding hi.
Kha khat pan kum nga ciang a phate pen pasal ahihleh ngun shekel nga hi dinga, numei ahihleh ngun shekel thum hi ding hi.
Kum sawmguk pan a tungsiahte pen pasal ahihleh shekel sawm le nga hi dinga, numei ahihleh shekel sawm hi ding hi.

“Mi khatpeuh zawnglua-in nangma sehzah a piak zawh kei leh, siampipa kiangah a mi hong kipaipih dinga, siampipa in ama man seh ding hi. A kiciam mipa a siamna tawh kizui-in siampipa in ama man seh ding hi.
“Mite inTopa’tungah biakna-in a piakte pen ganhing ahihleh, mi khatpeuh inTopa’tungah a piak tua bang ganhingte khempeuh a siangtho ahi hi.Topa’Topa’

Amah in na khat peuhpeuh, a hoihte a hoih lo tawh ahi zongin, a hoih lote a hoih tawh ahi zongin, laih lo, khek lo ding hi. Amah in ganhing khat ganhing adang khat tawh a khek leh, tua ganhing le a khekna ganhing a siangtho hi khawm ding hi.
Tua penTopa’tungah a kipia thei lo ganhing nin khat ahihleh, mipa in siampipa mai-ah a ganhing paipih dinga,Topa’
siampipa in hoih hi, ci-in ahi zongin sia hi, ci-in ahi zongin a man zah seh ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua ganhing a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat behlap ding hi.
“Mi khatpeuh in a siangtho dinginTopa’tungah a inn a ap ciangin, siampipa in a hoihna le a hoih lohna tawh kizui-in a man seh dinga, siampipa’ sehna bangin kip ding hi.Topa’
A ap pa in ama inn a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat sum tawh behlap dinga, tua inn ama a’ hikik ding hi.

“Mi khat in a luah ama leitang phelkhatTopa’tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici vawh zah ding tawh kizui ding hi. Mangbuhham beem khat dim a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi.Topa’
Amah in jubilee kum a kipanin a lo a ap leh, nangma sehna zahzah bit ding hi.
Ahih hangin jubilee kum khit ciangin amah in a lo a ap leh, siampipa in jubilee kumkik dong a omlai kumte tawh kizui-in a manzah sum seh dinga, nangma sehna zah panin kikhiam ding hi.
Lo a ap pa in a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat sum tawh behlap dinga, tua lo ama a’ hisuak ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a lo a tanh nuam lo ahi a, amah in midang khat tungah a zuak ahi zongin ahihleh, tua pen amah in tanhkik thei nawn lo ding hi.
A lo pen, jubilee huna piak khiat ciangin, a ki-apsa lo mah banginTopa’tungah a siangtho hi dinga, siampipa in tua lo tang ding hi.Topa’
“Amah in luahna tawh a neih ahi lo, a leisa lo penTopa’tungah a ap leh,Topa’
siampipa in jubilee kum ciang dong ding tua man seh dinga, tua ni-in a mipa in a kiseh zah,Topa’tungah a siangtho-in pia ding hi.Topa’
Jubilee kum ciangin a lo pen a kileinapa, gamhluahna tawh tua leitang a nei mipa tungah tungkik ding hi.
“A kisehna peuhmah biakinn shekel kizang ding hi; gerah sawmnih ciangin shekel khat hi ding hi.
“Ahih hangin tacil penTopaa’ hi khinzo ahih mah bangin, kuamah in ganhing tacilte ap thei lo ding hi; bawng hitaleh tuu hitalehTopa-a’ ahi hi.TopaTopa
Ganhing nin ahihleh, nangma sehna bangin amah in leikikin, tua banah seh nga-ah khat behlap ding hi. Tua hi lo a, a kitat kei leh, a kisehna bangin kizuak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin mi khat in a neih,Topa’tungah a ap, a ki-apsa nate, mi hitaleh ganhing hitaleh, a luah ama lo hitaleh, kizuak lo ding, kitanh lo ding hi. A ki-ap na peuhmahTopa’tungah a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’Topa’
Mite lak nangawn panin a kisusia mang dingin a ki-apsa mi peuhmah, kitanh lo dinga, kithat ding hi.
“Leitang panin a piang khempeuh khaici hitaleh singgah hitaleh sawm-ah-khatTopaa’ hi a,Topaadingin siangtho hi.TopaTopa
Mi khatpeuh in sawm-ah-khat a piak na khat peuhpeuh a tat nop leh, amah in tua banah nga-ah khat behlap ding hi.
Bawnghon leh tuulekeel hon sawm-ah-khat khempeuh le a cing pa’ ciangkhut nuai-a a pai ganhing khempeuh sawm-ah-khat peuhmahTopaadingin a siangtho hi ding hi.Topa
Mi khat in pha hiam sia hiam ci-in kantel lo dinga, khek lo ding hi. A khek leh, tua leh a khekna pen a siangtho hi khawm ding hi. Tua pen kitanh lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte pen Sinai Mual tungahTopain Israel mite adingin Moses tungah a piak thute ahi hi.Topa
